WoodpeckerElectro.name: Woodpecker Electro
WoodpeckerElectro.desc4: Landing a critical hit on an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> increases the equipper's ATK by 9% for 6s. The buff duration for different skills are calculated separately.
WoodpeckerElectro.story: A Drive Disc so hot it's gone viral. Even ordinary citizens who don't enter the Hollows will do anything to get their hands on it. The tunes burned on it are absolutely captivating.

PufferElectro.name: Puffer Electro
PufferElectro.desc4: <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> DMG increases by 20%. Launching an <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> increases the equipper's ATK by 15% for 12s.
PufferElectro.story: This reliable Drive Disc series is favored by Hollow explorers due to its consistent performance. Don't underestimate its effectiveness, pufferfish are poisonous, after all.

ShockstarDisco.name: Shockstar Disco
ShockstarDisco.desc4: <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</color>, and <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counters</color> inflict 20% more Daze to the main target.
ShockstarDisco.story: A Drive Disc designed with algorithmic optimization for W-Engine compatibility, improving auxiliary performance.

FreedomBlues.name: Freedom Blues
FreedomBlues.desc4: When an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy, reduce the target's Anomaly Buildup RES to the equipper's Attribute by 20% for 8s. This effect does not stack with others of the same attribute.
FreedomBlues.story: Highly regarded by both investigators and Hollow Raiders alike, this Drive Disc series has surprisingly consistent acclaim.

HormonePunk.name: Hormone Punk
HormonePunk.desc4: Upon entering combat or switching in, its user's ATK increases by 25% for 10s. This effect can trigger once every 20s.
HormonePunk.story: This Drive Disc series is highly recommended by the Hollow Investigative Association. According to incomplete statistics, investigators using this Drive Disc display a higher desire for combat.

SoulRock.name: Soul Rock
SoulRock.desc4: Upon receiving an enemy attack and losing HP, the equipper takes 40% less DMG for 2.5s. This effect can trigger once every 15s.
SoulRock.story: A mysterious and colorful Drive Disc. The creator and Master Copy are both unknown. Although many different versions burned versions are circulating among Hollow Raiders, where the original comes from remains a mystery.

SwingJazz.name: Swing Jazz
SwingJazz.desc4: Launching a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> increases all squad members' DMG by 15% for 12s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.
SwingJazz.story: A Drive Disc highly favored by versatile investigators, with a focus on high compatibility and enhanced cooperative support.

ChaosJazz.name: Chaos Jazz
ChaosJazz.desc4: <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> and <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> increases by 15%. While off-field, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Attack</color> DMG increases by 20%. When switching on-field, this buff continues for 5s, and this continuation effect can trigger once every 7.5s.
ChaosJazz.story: A Drive Disc with a steep learning curve that really tests users' understanding of Ether devices.

ProtoPunk.name: Proto Punk
ProtoPunk.desc4: When any squad member triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color>, all squad members deal 15% increased DMG, lasting 10s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.
ProtoPunk.story: Carefully selected as a recommended Drive Disc series by the Hollow Investigative Association. It offers a significant Ether increase, but also requires more effort to control.

InfernoMetal.name: Inferno Metal
InfernoMetal.desc4: Upon hitting a <color=#FF5521>Burning</color> enemy, the equipper's CRIT Rate is increased by 28% for 8s.
InfernoMetal.story: A Drive Disc burned with specialized Ether technology offering personalized attribute amplification to the user.

ChaoticMetal.name: Chaotic Metal
ChaoticMetal.desc4: The equipper's CRIT DMG increases by 20%. When any character in the squad triggers <color=#FE437E>Corruption's</color> additional DMG, this effect further increases by 5.5% for 8s, stacking up to 6 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
ChaoticMetal.story: A Drive Disc burned with specialized Ether technology offering personalized attribute amplification to the user.

ThunderMetal.name: Thunder Metal
ThunderMetal.desc4: As long as an enemy in combat is <color=#2EB6FF>Shocked</color>, the equipper's ATK is increased by 28%.
ThunderMetal.story: A Drive Disc burned with specialized Ether technology offering personalized attribute amplification to the user.

PolarMetal.name: Polar Metal
PolarMetal.desc4: Increase the DMG of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> by 20%. When any squad member inflicts <color=#98EFF0>Freeze</color> or <color=#98EFF0>Shatter</color>, this effect increases by an additional 20% for 12s.
PolarMetal.story: A Drive Disc burned with specialized Ether technology offering personalized attribute amplification to the user.

FangedMetal.name: Fanged Metal
FangedMetal.desc4: Whenever a squad member inflicts <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> on an enemy, the equipper deals 35% additional DMG to the target for 12s.
FangedMetal.story: A Drive Disc burned with specialized Ether technology offering personalized attribute amplification to the user.

BranchBladeSong.name: Branch & Blade Song
BranchBladeSong.desc4: When Anomaly Mastery exceeds or equals 115 points, the equipper's CRIT DMG increases by 30%. When any squad member applies <color=#98EFF0>Freeze</color> or triggers the <color=#98EFF0>Shatter</color> effect on an enemy, the equipper's CRIT Rate increases by 12%, lasting 15s.
BranchBladeSong.story: Inspired by the legendary "Tale of Blade & Branch," this song depicts a young man with amazing swordsmanship as he travels the world, doing good deeds and fighting evil. Some say it's a biography of a prodigious swordsman of the Hoshimi family.

AstralVoice.name: Astral Voice
AstralVoice.desc4: Whenever any squad member enters the field using a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, all squad members gain 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Astral</color>, up to a maximum of 3 stacks, and lasting 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Astral</color> increases the DMG dealt by the character entering the field using a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> by 8%. Only one instance of this effect can exist in the same squad.
AstralVoice.story: Drive Discs made by a Hollow Raider and Astra Yao fan that record a signature motif in Astra's works. Meanwhile, on the back, the Hollow Raider's own story is printed there.

ShadowHarmony.name: Shadow Harmony
ShadowHarmony.desc2: The DMG of <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershocks</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</color> is increased by 15%.
ShadowHarmony.desc4: Upon hitting an enemy with an <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, if the DMG dealt aligns with the equipper's attribute, the equipper gains 1 stack of a buff effect, at most once per use of a skill. For each stack, the equipper's ATK increases by 4%, and CRIT Rate increases by 4%. The effect can stack up to 3 times and lasts for 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

PhaethonsMelody.name: Phaethon's Melody
PhaethonsMelody.desc4: When any squad member uses an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the equipper's Anomaly Proficiency increases by 45 for 8s. If the character using the <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> is not the equipper, the equipper's <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> is increased by 25%.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Turbo Volt
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 slashes. The first 3 hits deal <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>, the 4th hit deals <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Thunderbolt
Description.Desc:
After unleashing the 3rd hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, hold down or pause for a short while, and then press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes a downward strike that deals <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dodge: Slide
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Taser Blast
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slashes all nearby enemies, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Thunderclap
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Fork Lightning
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Unleashes an upward slash that deals <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
This attack launches faster when used after the 3rd hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Lightning Bolt
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful upward slash that deals massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
This attack launches faster when used after the 3rd hit of her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Electro Engine
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful upwards slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Overdrive Engine
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful upward slash at enemies in a small area followed by several downward strikes, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Thunderfall
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Flash
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Lightning Whirl
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Perform a spinning slash against enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1011006.Name: EX Special Attack: Lightning Bolt (Quick Launch)

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Anby's <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> hits an enemy, she gains an extra 7.2 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 5s.

When Anby's <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> hits an enemy, she gains an extra 7.2 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 5s.

Additional Ability: Parallel Connection
Desc: Launch a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> after the 3rd hit of Anby's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> for an extra <color=#2BAD00>58.6%</color> Daze.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Anby's <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> hits an enemy, she gains an extra 7.2 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 5s.

Additional Ability: Parallel Connection
Desc: Launch a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> after the 3rd hit of Anby's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> for an extra <color=#2BAD00>64%</color> Daze.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Anby's <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> hits an enemy, she gains an extra 7.2 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 5s.

1.Name: Rapid Charge Mode
1.Desc: When the 4th hit of Anby's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> hits an enemy, her Energy Generation Rate is increased by 12% for 30s.
1.Desc2:
"Charge up for just a minute, and you're set to fight for an hour!" That's the sales pitch for these weapon expansion modules.
And they deliver exactly that.

2.Name: Precision Discharge
2.Desc: When <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</color> hits a Stunned enemy, its DMG is increased by 30%. When Anby's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy that is not Stunned, the Daze inflicted is increased by 10%.
2.Desc2:
"Electric shocks will knock you out cold."
Looking at the enemy out cold at her feet, she added:
"At least, that's what happens in the movies."

3.Name: Well-Disciplined
3.Desc2: Run, slash, move like lightning. She is no amateur when it comes to Hollows—she's an expert.

4.Name: Conducting Charge
4.Desc:
When Anby launches a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or uses her <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, off-field Electric Agents recover 3 Energy.
For every 12% Energy Generation Rate Anby has, recover an additional 2 Energy, up to a maximum of 6.
4.Desc2: You won't last long fighting solo. An experienced Hollow Raider knows how to create opportunities for their teammates.

5.Name: Street Experience
5.Desc2: Working for the Cunning Hares not only builds your mental toughness but also helps (or rather, forces) you to get in shape.

6.Name: Charging Field
6.Desc: When Anby uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, she gains 8 stacks of Charge (max 8 stacks). When she hits an enemy with her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, increasing that attack's DMG by 45%.
6.Desc2:
Coils of electricity flickered over her fingertips.
Anby raised her head, eyes brimming with determination beyond her years.
Perhaps, one day, she will be the one with total mastery over electricity.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Kitty Slash
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 5 slashes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
On the last hit, there is a 33.33% chance to repeat this hit 3 times.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Crimson Blade
Description.Desc:
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during the first 3 hits of Nekomata's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front and passes through them, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Upon activation, there is a 33.33% chance to repeat this attack 3 times.

Description.Name: Dodge: Can't Touch Me-ow~
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Over Here!
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Phantom Claws
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Surprise Attack
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Unleashes a downward strike, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Super Surprise Attack!
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful falling slash that deals massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Super Surprise Attack!
Chain Attack: Claw Swipe
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful slash at enemies ahead in a large area, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Claw Smash
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes powerful slashes at enemies ahead in a large area, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Cat's Paw
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Desperate Defense
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Shadow Strike
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Charge and slash enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1021004.Name: EX Special Attack: Super Surprise Attack!

Additional Ability: Catwalk

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
After any character inflicts <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color>, increases the DMG of Nekomata's next <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> by 35%, stacking up to 2 times.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:

Additional Ability: Catwalk
Desc: When Nekomata's <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> hits an enemy, her DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>60%</color> for 6s.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
After any character inflicts <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color>, increases the DMG of Nekomata's next <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> by 35%, stacking up to 2 times.

1.Name: Bird Hunter
1.Desc: When Nekomata hits an enemy from behind, she ignores 16% of her target's <color=#F0D12B>Physical RES</color>. If the enemy is Stunned, all Nekomata's attacks are considered back attacks.
1.Desc2: While Nekomata lacks strength due to her small size, she has the perceptiveness and agility required to locate her enemies' weaknesses and strike right where it hurts most.

2.Name: Cat & Mouse
2.Desc: When there's only one enemy on the field and Nekomata is in combat, her Energy Generation Rate is increased by 25%.
2.Desc2:
Cats always prefer to toy with their prey.
If there's only one mouse left in combat — that's Nekomata's play time.

3.Name: Curious Left Tail
3.Desc2:
According to the legends of the old civilization, each tail represents one of a cat's many lives, with years of wisdom and experience stored within...
Even if that's not true, the experience Nekomata has gained on the streets certainly is.

4.Name: Sharpen Claws
4.Desc: When Nekomata uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, her CRIT Rate increases by 7% for 15s, stacking up to 2 times, with each stack's duration being calculated separately.
4.Desc2:
"Gimme more, gimme MORE! I can eat 'em all~"
Her eyes sparkle as she licks the back of her paws.

5.Name: Lucky Right Tail
5.Desc2: According to the legends of the old civilization, each tail represents one of a cat's many lives, with years of wisdom and experience stored within... Sometimes Nekomata wonders to herself: If she is lucky enough to keep surviving, will she eventually grow another tail?

6.Name: Predator Lineage
6.Desc: When Nekomata launches a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or uses her <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, her CRIT DMG increases by 18%, stacking up to 3 times. The effect expires when she's no longer in-combat. This effect gains maximum stacks immediately on defeating an enemy.
6.Desc2:
"When a feline Thiren gets positive reinforcement from aggressive behavior,
their latent animalistic tendencies emerge.
Fortunately, these tendencies aren't permanent..."
—Excerpt from the Handbook of Incomplete Research on Feline Thirens

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Cunning Combo
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 3 strikes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Do As I Please
Description.Desc: After using a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, Nicole can reload, and her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> are enhanced, increasing the power of her bullets.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Do As I Please
Dodge: Speed Demon
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
Drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to dodge, then hold <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to reload while dodging, enhancing <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</color> up to 8 times.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Jack in the Box
Description.Desc:
When dragging the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} during a dodge, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal>:
Dashes in the target direction and strikes nearby enemies, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
When not dragging the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} during a dodge, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal>:
Vaults backward and launches a ranged strike against enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, up to 8 times.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Diverted Bombard
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Dodge backwards and send a ranged strike at enemies in front, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1.Name: Supercharged Bomb
1.Desc: The DMG and the Anomaly Buildup inflicted by Nicole's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> increases by 16%. For each additional 0.1s of charging when Nicole activates her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the duration of the energy field created at the target location increases by 0.15s
1.Desc2:
"I've juiced you all up! Go get 'em!"
"Huh? I-I wasn't slacking off, I swear — I just needed a break!"

2.Name: Charging Device
2.Desc: Nicole recovers 5 Energy when <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Mechanical Case's</color> debuff is triggered. This effect can trigger once every 15s.
2.Desc2:
"Never underestimate the value of a single second!"
"Do you have any idea how much extra I can squeeze out of just one second? It's unfathomable!"
"So, can I get a productivity bonus? How about 10%, huh?"

3.Name: A Hare's Cunning
3.Desc2: Without overpowering might or abundant resources, Nicole depended on her own sharp mind to bring the Cunning Hares to where they are today.

4.Name: Field Expansion
4.Desc: When Nicole uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, the diameter of the energy field generated at the target location is increased by 3m.
4.Desc2:
"This, and this too — all of this will soon become the Cunning Hares' territory. Do you hear me!"
"W—What? How soon?"
"Uh... in about ten thousand years, based on current revenue projections."

5.Name: Industry Star
5.Desc2: Though they have plenty of enemies in the industry, Nicole has led her team out of many impossible situations, and so their reputation and experience steadily grew.

6.Name: Corrupting Energy Field
6.Desc: When Nicole's energy fields deal DMG to an enemy, all squad member's CRIT Rate against that enemy increases by 1.5%, stacking up to 10 times, and lasting 12s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
6.Desc2: A switch to higher quality ammo with better firepower and increased compressed Etheric Matter leads to higher damage, longer use duration... and higher costs.

1.Name: Rapid Heat
1.Desc: When Soldier 11 enters combat or switches in, if her Energy is less than 40, her Energy is recovered to 80. This effect can trigger once every 50s.
1.Desc2:
Long-term high-intensity combat training allows Soldier 11 to complete mastery of her regulatory systems.
She will always strive to ensure that she's in the best shape for each and every battle.

2.Name: Scorching Convergence
2.Desc: When triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, and <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> DMG increases by 3%, up to 12 stacks, lasting 15s, with the duration of each stack calculated separately.
2.Desc2:
"She may look cold and hard, like a big ice cube... But actually, she's scalding hot inside, like a blazing fire."
— From an anonymous soldier of the Obsidian Division

3.Name: Elite Soldier
3.Desc2: Soldier 11 always expects the most from herself, no matter if it's in training or physical combat. That is how she maintains her combat prowess.

4.Name: Indulgent Blaze
4.Desc:
If <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> is triggered during the 1st, 2nd, or 3rd hit of Soldier 11's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or a <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, Anti-Interrupt Level increases and DMG received is reduced by 18% during skill activation.
If <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> is triggered during the 4th hit of her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, she becomes invulnerable during skill activation.
4.Desc2: She envies fire. And these smoldering flames will always help her.

5.Name: Perfect Soldier
5.Desc2: The road from elite to exemplar is long and difficult, but Soldier 11 grits her teeth and perseveres, as if there's something pushing her towards the goal of becoming a perfect soldier...

6.Name: Scorching Flow
6.Desc:
When Soldier 11 uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, she gains 8 stacks of Charge (max 8 stacks).
When <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> is triggered, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, causing the current move to ignore 25% of the target's <color=#FF5521>Fire RES</color>.
6.Desc2: The flames of the sword distorted the air with their heat. Her movements grew ever more impassioned, as if that heat seeped into her spirit with every breath, igniting her thoughts.

1.Name: Open Trauma
1.Desc: When Corin's <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> hits an enemy, her DMG against the target increases by 12% for 15s.
1.Desc2:
"The young mistress always said, if something's worth doing, it's worth focusing on."
"I've been practicing, and I can do it now!"
"But... are you watching me...?"

2.Name: Atomic Smash
2.Desc: When Corin's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> hits an enemy, the target's <color=#F0D12B>Physical RES</color> is reduced by 0.5%, stacking up to 20 times and lasting 5s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
2.Desc2:
"Sorry, Mr. or Ms. Ethereal!"
"But I've got work to do... I really am sorry!"
Feeling guilty, Corin sincerely apologizes to the monster — as she wields her savage chainsaw, slicing through the enemies in her way.

3.Name: Amateur Maid
3.Desc2: "I—I'll do my best to become a good maid!" Corin said, walking towards the Ethereals, chainsaw in hand.

4.Name: Battlefield Retainer
4.Desc: When Corin uses a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, she recovers 7.2 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 16s.
4.Desc2:
A diligent and serious young maid, Corin always puts her heart and soul into everything she does.
Of course, that includes taking out enemies in combat.

5.Name: Special Ops Maid
5.Desc2:
"Uh... sorry, I'm so clumsy. I don't know how to make sure my cuts are even..."
—Said Corin as she looked down at the bits of Ethereal scattered across the ground.

6.Name: Accumulated Release
6.Desc:
When Corin's extended slash hits an enemy, she obtains a stack of Charge (max 40 stacks).
During a <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</color>, when her chainsaw detonation hits an enemy, consumes all stacks of Charge. Each stack consumed causes the attack to deal an additional 3% of ATK as DMG.
6.Desc2:
Corin knows that she isn't the most powerful of maids, nor the smartest. But she hopes to become the hardest working.
She puts to good use everything she's ever learned.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Rampaging Slash
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 6 slashes ahead, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Dead End
Description.Desc:
When there are sufficient <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color>, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Consume 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Point</color> to toss the shield and attack nearby enemies in all directions, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dodge: Adrift
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Hog Rush
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Strikes forward with the shield, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
During skill activation, DMG taken is reduced by 40%, and when attacked by an enemy, Caesar blocks with the shield and gets knocked back. Following that, press <IconMap:Icon_Special> or <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color> and activate <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Roaring Thrust</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Eye For an Eye
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Stabs at enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Eye For an Eye
Special Attack: Shockwave Shield Bash
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Strike forward with the shield, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
If Caesar is hit by an enemy at the beginning of the skill's activation, it will trigger a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color>, negating the damage once and automatically following up with a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Roaring Thrust</color>.
After using the skill, Caesar enters a guard stance, reducing incoming damage by 40%. When attacked by an enemy, Caesar blocks with the shield and gets slightly knocked back. Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> or <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color>, activating <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Roaring Thrust</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color>
When <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color> is triggered, Caesar is invulnerable while using the skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Roaring Thrust
Description.Desc:
After activating <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Shockwave Shield Bash</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Thrusts forward, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
If <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color> is not triggered, the Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill when <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color> is triggered.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Parry Counter
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Strikes forward with the shield, followed by a powerful thrust, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
If Caesar is hit by an enemy at the beginning of the skill activation or an <color=#FFFFFF>Interrupt</color> is triggered with the shield strike, it will trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color>, negating incoming damage once and countering with a shield attack. After triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color> without consuming energy.
After using the skill, Caesar enters a guard stance, reducing incoming damage by 40%. When attacked by an enemy, Caesar blocks the attack and is knocked back. Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> or <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color> and activate <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Roaring Thrust</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color>
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash
Description.Desc:
After activating <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Parry Counter</color>, with enough energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Strikes forward with the shield, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
If Caesar is hit by an enemy at the beginning of the skill activation or an <color=#FFFFFF>Interrupt</color> is triggered with the shield strike, it will trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color>, negating incoming damage once and recovering the Energy used to activate the skill.
When the skill is activated through <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color>, it cannot trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color> again.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Stance Switch
Description.Desc: When Caesar triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, her impact is increased by <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:8+AvatarSkillLevel(1)*1,1,2}</color>% for 3s.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash
Chain Attack: Road Rage Slam
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful downward strike at enemies ahead, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Savage Smash
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Tosses the shield forward, unleashing a powerful spinning attack on enemies in front, followed by a downward strike, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
When hitting shielded enemies, the Daze dealt is increased by <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:40+AvatarSkillLevel(3)*5,1,2}%</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Lane Change
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Thrust at enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Aegis Shield
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color> when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Aiding Blade
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Tosses the shield forward, unleashing a powerful spinning attack on enemies in front, followed by a slash that deals <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
After activating the skill, press <IconMap:Icon_Special> or <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to trigger a <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color>, activating <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Roaring Thrust</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1071006.Name: EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash

1071007.Name: EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash (Retaliation)

1071009.Name: Dodge Counter: Eye For an Eye

Name: Core Passive: Barrier of Resilience
Additional Ability: Battle Spirit
Desc:
When Caesar activates <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Parry Counter</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, or triggers <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color> through <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color>, she buffs all squad members with a <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> shield equal to <color=#2BAD00>300%</color> of her base Impact + <color=#2BAD00>200</color>. The shield lasts for 60s and is equipped by the active character, with its value shared among all squad members. Any single instance of DMG will not exceed the shield value.
While <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> is active, the shield bearer's Anti-Interrupt level is increased.
While <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> is active, the shield bearer's ATK is increased by <color=#2BAD00>40</color>. After <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> expires, this buff remains for an additional 5s.

When another character in your squad can activate <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> or shares the same Faction:
When Caesar activates <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Dead End</color>, she applies a Debuff effect to enemies within a 7m radius, increasing the damage they take from all squad members by 25% for 30s.

The shield lasts for 60s and is equipped by the active character, with its value shared among all squad members. Any single instance of DMG will not exceed the shield value.
While <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> is active, the shield bearer's Anti-Interrupt level is increased.
While <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> is active, the shield bearer's ATK is increased by <color=#2BAD00>135</color>. After <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> expires, this buff remains for an additional 5s.

When Caesar activates <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Block</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Retaliation</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Dead End</color>, she applies a Debuff effect to enemies within a 7m radius, increasing the damage they take from all squad members by 25% for 30s.

1.Name: Spearhead Advance
1.Desc: When Caesar enters combat or switches in, she instantly buffs all squad members with a <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> shield. This effect can trigger once every 300s. While <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> is active, enemies within a 5m radius of the shield bearer suffer a 15% All-Attribute RES reduction.
1.Desc2:
"Big Daddy taught me that this is when you form a spearheaded formation with overwhelming force and strike at the enemy's weakest point—"
"And I'll be leading the charge, of course!"

2.Name: Legacy of the Far Lands
2.Desc: While <color=#FFFFFF>Radiant Aegis</color> from <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Barrier of Resilience</color> is active, Caesar's Energy Generation Rate increases by 10%, and the shield bearer's ATK boost is increased to 150% of its original value.
2.Desc2:
Caesar's combat style stands out from those of New Eridu or the Outer Ring, drawing from the techniques of the most skilled warriors among the wanderers.
Knowing when to hold back and when to strike decisively — that has always been the wanderer's way of survival. And Caesar has always been a good student of this philosophy.

3.Name: Absolute Trust
3.Desc2:
Once Caesar recognizes someone as one of her own, she fully accepts them as part of her inner circle. She gives them absolute trust, letting her guard down completely...
Just like she does with you now.

4.Name: Aries the Battering-Ram
4.Desc: When Caesar uses a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, she gains 3 additional <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color>. If her Energy is below 20, she can activate <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color> with 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Point</color> instead. This substitution can trigger once every 5s.
4.Desc2:
One of the tactics Caesar mastered under the guidance of the wanderers.
"No matter what, I'll fight till the last moment!"

5.Name: Romantic Conquest
5.Desc2:
Behind Caesar's carefree and unpolished appearance lies a romantic at heart.
She's always curious about love stories.
But if you dig a little deeper into the subject... you might just catch her blushing.

6.Name: Overlord's Will
6.Desc: <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</color> are guaranteed to trigger a critical hit. The skill's DMG is increased by 50% and deals additional 50% DMG to the primary target. When Caesar uses <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Overpowered Shield Bash</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</color>, her CRIT Rate is increased by 30% and her CRIT DMG is increased by 60% for 15s.
6.Desc2:
"I used to keep my eyes straight ahead, thinking that as long as I was strong enough, I could do anything."
"But being a great leader takes more than just power."
"I need to protect my friends behind me — they are the reason I can keep going."

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Full Firepower
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes a piercing attack, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Repeatedly press or hold to enter Crouching Shot to extend the attack duration.
Drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} during Crouching Shot to launch Rolling Shot and adjust the character's position, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Stop pressing or holding during Crouching Shot to launch Finishing Shot at enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: Risky Business
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Starlight Sanction
Description.Desc:
When dragging the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} during a dodge, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal>:
Launches a piercing attack at nearby enemies within a large area, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
When not dragging the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} during a dodge, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal>:
Launches a piercing attack at enemies in a line, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Fair Fight
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Pierces enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Stand Still
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Performs up to 3 piercing attacks in a line, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Clearance Time
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Launches a powerful piercing attack in a line, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Starlight Mirage
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful piercing attack at surrounding enemies in a large area, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Starlight, Shine Bright
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful piercing attack at surrounding enemies in a large area, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Power of Teamwork
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Launches a piercing attack at enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Evasive Assist: Flash Spin
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Dodges the enemy's attack and activates <color=#FFFFFF>Vital View</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Fatal Shot
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after an <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color> to activate:
Pierces enemies in a large area in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Name: Core Passive: Steady Shot
Additional Ability: Team Starlight
Desc: Billy's DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>25%</color> when he enters Crouching Shot during his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>. The effect ends if he moves, returns to standby, or is knocked back or launched by an attack.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
After Billy uses a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, the DMG of his next <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> is increased by 50%, stacking up to 2 times. This effect resets whenever an <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> is activated.

Desc: Billy's DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>41.6%</color> when he enters Crouching Shot during his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>. The effect ends if he moves, returns to standby, or is knocked back or launched by an attack.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
After Billy uses a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, the DMG of his next <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> is increased by 50%, stacking up to 2 times. This effect resets whenever an <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> is activated.

Name: Core Passive: Steady Shot
Additional Ability: Team Starlight
Desc: Billy's DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>45.8%</color> when he enters Crouching Shot during his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>. The effect ends if he moves, returns to standby, or is knocked back or launched by an attack.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
After Billy uses a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, the DMG of his next <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> is increased by 50%, stacking up to 2 times. This effect resets whenever an <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> is activated.

Name: Core Passive: Steady Shot
Additional Ability: Team Starlight
Desc: Billy's DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>50%</color> when he enters Crouching Shot during his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>. The effect ends if he moves, returns to standby, or is knocked back or launched by an attack.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
After Billy uses a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, the DMG of his next <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> is increased by 50%, stacking up to 2 times. This effect resets whenever an <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> is activated.

1.Name: Dazzling Entrance
1.Desc: When Billy hits an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, he gains an additional 2.7 Energy. Can trigger once every 5s.
1.Desc2:
"You guys are way too honest to be bad guys!"
"All lined up, like NPCs at the shooting range!"

2.Name: Roaming Gunslinger
2.Desc: Billy's <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> DMG increases by 25%. Rolling Shots during his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color> count as dodges, making Billy Invulnerable during skill activation and able to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodges</color>. When a Rolling Shot triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color>, it will automatically follow up with a <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>.
2.Desc2:
"The Starlight Knights never run from danger. That's what we call tactical repositioning for better aim!"
— User "Dreamgirl Monica" from the Starlight Radiance messageboards.

3.Name: Teachings of the Starlight Knights
3.Desc2: Never neglect your training, and never stop improving! This is the philosophy of the Starlight Knights. Billy believes in it wholeheartedly, and practices it sincerely.

4.Name: Starlight Ballistics
4.Desc: When Billy hits an enemy with his <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the skill's CRIT Rate increases based on the distance from the enemy. The closer he is to the target, the greater the effect, up to a maximum increase of 32%.
4.Desc2:
These explosive bullets of Billy's own invention are incredibly lethal at close range.
Their performance far outstrips Billy's original intention of simply making them cooler.

5.Name: Lost Technological Construct
5.Desc2: Unknown precision components and unique structural design have given Billy performance far beyond his peers... And maintenance costs far beyond his means.

6.Name: Starlight Hero
6.Desc: When Billy accumulates 10 hits on enemies or triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color>, his DMG increases by 6%, stacking up to 5 times and lasting until he's knocked back or launched by an attack.
6.Desc2:
"Hooboy~ Feelin' great! Move aside, Anby, it's my time to shine!"
"Yo, Anby — can you play the Starlight Knight theme?"
—excerpt from Cunning Hares' "Top 10 Forbidden Sentences," selected by Anby

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Kazahana
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to five slashes ahead, the first two deal <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>, and the last three deal <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Block enemy attacks during the 5th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Shimotsuki
Description.Desc:
With at least 2 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Hoshimi Miyabi sheaths her blade, enters <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color> and starts to charge up. Every level of charge will consume 2 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>, up to a maximum of three levels of charge.
When releasing <IconMap:Icon_Normal>, or when <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> is completely depleted, Hoshimi Miyabi will draw her blade and unleash a powerful slash ahead based on the current charge level, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>. She then exits <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color>.
Character is invulnerable during <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color>.
Hoshimi Miyabi can have up to 6 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>. Upon entering the battlefield, Hoshimi Miyabi immediately obtains 3 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>.

Param.Name: Charge Level One Slash DMG Multiplier
Charge Level Two Slash DMG Multiplier
Charge Level Three Slash DMG Multiplier
Charge Level One Slash Daze Multiplier
Charge Level Two Slash Daze Multiplier
Charge Level Three Slash Daze Multiplier

Description.Name: Dodge: Mizutori
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
While dodging, repeatedly press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A dash dodge that covers a lot of ground.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Fuyubachi
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Kan Suzume
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Miyuki
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Quickly draws her blade and slashes ahead, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Hisetsu
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Rush forward, unleashing powerful slashes against enemies along the way, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Upon activating this skill, gain 2 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, with enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> again to activate:
Consume extra Energy and unleash a powerful follow-up attack against enemies in front, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Upon activating this skill, gain 2 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Spring's Call
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful slash at enemies in front in a large area, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Lingering Snow
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes powerful slashes at enemies ahead in a large area then pauses, before unleashing a Finishing Move, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Upon activating this skill, gain 3 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> and increase <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> by 30% for 12s.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Dancing Petals
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Drifting Petals
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Falling Petals
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Charges and slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1091003.Name: Basic Attack: Shimotsuki
1091003.Desc: <IconMap:Icon_Normal> (Hold) (With at least 2 points of Fallen Frost)

Name: Core Passive: Searing Cold
Additional Ability: Bask in Frost
Desc:
When Hoshimi Miyabi deals <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>, she applies <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color> to the target, lasting 30s. When accumulating <color=#98EFF0>Frost Anomaly Buildup</color> against targets with <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color>, increases <color=#98EFF0>Frost Anomaly Buildup Rate</color> by 100% of Hoshimi Miyabi's CRIT Rate, up to a maximum increase of 80%. As Hoshimi Miyabi accumulates <color=#98EFF0>Frost Anomaly Buildup</color>, it has its own independent Attribute Anomaly Buildup gauge and triggers <color=#98EFF0>Freeze</color>, <color=#98EFF0>Shatter</color>, and <color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</color> that can react with other Attribute Anomalies, including <color=#98EFF0>Ice Attribute Anomaly</color>, to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color>.
When Hoshimi Miyabi applies <color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</color> to enemies with <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color>, it will consume the <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color> to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</color>, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color> equal to <color=#2BAD00>750%</color> of Hoshimi Miyabi's ATK and causing the target to enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color> state. All squad members accumulate <color=#2BAD00>14%</color> more Anomaly Buildup against enemies under the <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color> state, but Hoshimi Miyabi cannot reapply <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color> to these enemies. The <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color> state ends when <color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</color> expires. While this state remains active, triggering another Attribute Anomaly will overwrite <color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</color> and remove <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color>.
Upon triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi obtains 1 point of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>. This effect can trigger once every 10s.

When another character in your squad is a <color=#FFFFFF>Support</color> character or shares the same Faction:
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> DMG increases by 60%. When any squad member triggers <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi obtains 2 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> during the next <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color> will ignore 30% of the target's <color=#98EFF0>Ice RES</color>.

1.Name: Frost Atop the Snow
1.Desc: While in <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color>, every 1 point of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> consumed will allow <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> to ignore 6% of DEF, stacking up to 6 times and lasting until <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color> ends. When the slash for charge level three of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> hits an enemy under <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color>, it will immediately remove the <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color> state and increase all squad members' Anomaly Buildup Rate by 20% for 10s.
1.Desc2:
Miyabi has loved reciting poems about the cold since she was a child. She might not understand them completely, but she still does it every day.
Before long, she came to realize their true meaning.
She found clarity not on a still and snowy night, but rather upon the battlefield.

2.Name: Breath Technique
2.Desc: <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Kazahana</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> DMG increases by 30%. Hoshimi Miyabi gains 1 point of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> when the final move of the 5th hit of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Kazahana</color> hits an enemy. Upon entering the battlefield, Hoshimi Miyabi immediately obtains 6 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> and her CRIT Rate increases by 15%.
2.Desc2:
"As goes the sword, so goes the heart." This is a key disciplinary concept of the Hoshimi school of swordsmanship.
Defeating the enemy is but the first step on the path to victory. 
Maintaining constant vigilance at all times is the true way of a warrior.

3.Name: Martial Discipline
3.Desc2: Miyabi, whose family has a tradition of martial arts, has excellent training habits. Her commitment to swordsmanship practice is unwavering. What? A meeting? She won't be going.

4.Name: Rupture
4.Desc: <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</color> DMG increases by 30%. Upon triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi generates 250 more Decibels.
4.Desc2:
Reciting poems during the heat of battle can regulate one's respiratory rhythm.
Whether it's her mindset or breathing, Miyabi always keeps calm.

5.Name: Anniversary
5.Desc2:
The girl arrives at that all too familiar place with flowers, her breath misting and then vanishing into the cold air.
Her fingers ghost over that name on the monument.
Everything is quiet, like that most silence observer.

6.Name: Prodigious Talent
6.Desc: During <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi obtains <color=#FFFFFF>Polar</color>, which increases <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> DMG by 30%. After obtaining <color=#FFFFFF>Polar</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi will automatically draw her blade and unleash powerful slashes based on the current charge level upon consuming <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>. Before <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> is completely depleted, the draw and slashes will not interrupt charging under <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color>. Each occurrence of <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color> can perform up to 3 draws and slashes.
6.Desc2: The more she battles, the more it becomes evident to outsiders: If there is a god of swordsmanship, it must greatly favor Hoshimi Miyabi.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Smash 'n' Bash
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 strikes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
When Koleda has the <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> effect, she can launch an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> after the 2nd hit, consuming the <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> effect and dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
When Koleda and Ben are deployed together, executing an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> will trigger a coordinated attack from both, further increasing the move's power;
Koleda is invulnerable during the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack's</color> 4th hit and enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: Wait 'n' See
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Tremble!
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a Dodge to activate:
Strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Don't Look Down on Me
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Strikes enemies in front and creates an explosion, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Don't Look Down on Me
Special Attack: Hammer Time
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Strikes enemies in front and triggers an explosion, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
This skill launches faster and triggers an explosion when used after the 2nd or 4th hit of Koleda's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.
When Koleda and Ben are both in your squad, and this skill is quickly launched after an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, they team up to launch a coordinated attack, further increasing the power of the skill.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Boiling Furnace
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Strikes enemies in front and triggers a powerful explosion, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. Koleda also gains the <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> effect.
This skill activates faster and triggers an explosion when used after the 2nd or 4th hit of Koleda's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.
When Koleda and Ben are both in your squad and this skill is quickly launched after an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, they team up to launch a coordinated attack, further increasing the power of the skill.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Natural Disaster
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful explosion on enemies in a large area, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> while also obtaining the <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> effect.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Hammerquake
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful explosion on enemies in a large area in front, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> while also obtaining the <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> effect.
Koleda and Ben can team up when fighting together to launch a coordinated attack, further increasing the power of the attack.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Coming Thru!
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Protective Hammer
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color> when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Hammer Bell
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Koleda charges and strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> and obtaining <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> effect.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1.Name: Beat of the Hammer
1.Desc: After the 2nd or 4th hit of Koleda's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or her enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, quickly use a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> to increase the Daze dealt by 15%.
1.Desc2: Her fiery temper is just a facade. In reality, Koleda's thoughts are quite intricate. For example, she knows when to swing her hammer for a more painful strike.

2.Name: Kinetic Recovery
2.Desc: When Koleda's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy, she recovers 60 Energy. Can trigger once every 45s.
2.Desc2:
Koleda believes perfect hammering has its own natural rhythm.
It's like tapping a tambourine, with each hit building up the tempo of the next beat.
Of course, it's hard to say how many taps her "toys" can endure.

3.Name: "Mind Your Own!"
3.Desc2:
As a qualified "toy," you better not cause trouble when Koleda starts to get a feel for swinging her hammer. Just take the beating.
—After all, what's the point of resisting?

4.Name: Furnace's Glow
4.Desc: Koleda gains one stack of Charge (max 2 stacks) when consuming <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> to use her Enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>. When her <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> hits an enemy, she consumes all stacks of Charge to increase the attack's DMG by 18% per stack.
4.Desc2:
Koleda feels the flames of war as her hammer swings raise the surrounding temperature.
She's now even more flammable and explosive than Ether.

5.Name: "You Dare Underestimate Me?"
5.Desc2: Koleda cares deeply about her role as a young leader potentially causing others to underestimate Belobog Heavy Industries. To compensate, she consistently trains diligently in secret.

6.Name: Saturated Blast
6.Desc: When <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> triggers an explosion that hits an enemy, it deals additional DMG equal to 360% of Koleda's ATK.
6.Desc2:
There are two types of people that Koleda really hates:
Stupid people, and hopelessly stupid people.
Luckily for her, Belobog always has a good supply of strong Ether explosives — plenty to use on the stupid.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Enthusiastic Drills
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 mixed attacks in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
The 4th hit is a <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color>.

During the 2nd <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color> and 3rd <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color>, press repeatedly or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to extend the skill duration.

Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Character is invulnerable during the attack.

Description.Desc:

Launches several <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attacks</color> at enemies in a line in front of him, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
Anton enters <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color> after using this skill. When in <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color>, Anton's attacks become more powerful, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> while continually consuming Energy upon hitting an enemy. Burst Mode remains active until his Energy is depleted.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Explosive Drill (Burst Mode)

Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1.Name: Warm-Up Exercises
1.Desc: When <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color> hits an enemy, Anton gains additional Energy, up to a maximum of 5 Energy per skill use.
1.Desc2:
"Are you awake? Get spinning, bro!"
"Try and keep up. It's time to do our stretches!"

2.Name: State of Flow
2.Desc: When Anton uses his <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> and enters <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color>, he gains a Shield that equals to 7.5% of his Max HP. While in <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color>, entering combat or switching in reapplies the Shield effect. This effect can trigger once every 15s. The Shield dissipates when <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color> ends.
2.Desc2:
After arduous training, a few lucky individuals will display exceptional vigor and perform above their usual level during high-intensity activities, entering a state of flow commonly known as "being in the zone."
Are you ready to get moving and enter the zone?
— Nitro-Fuel's exclusive program "Good Morning, Zealous Office Workers!"

3.Name: Rotational Training
3.Desc2: Knowing a bit of everything may seem underwhelming, but in a complex and ever-changing Hollow worksite, having a wide skillset can present an opportunity to overcome difficulties.

4.Name: Everyone Get Fired Up!
4.Desc: When Anton uses a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, all squad members' CRIT Rate increases by 10% for 12s.
4.Desc2:
"Find your rhythm, and let's get moving!"
When Anton starts to get serious, everyone becomes more nimble.
They have to keep up or else they will be training alone the next day.

5.Name: Jack of All Trades
5.Desc2: Knowing a bit of everything may seem underwhelming, but if you are resolute enough to change from "knowing a bit" to "being excellent," then you become omnipotent!

6.Name: Break the Limit
6.Desc: When Anton's <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color> triggers a critical hit, his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Enthusiastic Drills (Burst Mode)</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter: Overload Drill (Burst Mode)</color> deal 4% more DMG for 30s, stacking up to 6 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
6.Desc2:
"Yeah bro, can you feel the burn?"
Whenever Anton wants to exceed his limits,
his "bro" starts spinning at an astonishing pace, its buzzing echoing Anton's resolution.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Debt Reconciliation
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 3 strikes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: Missing Invoice
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Incoming Expense
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a Dodge to activate:
Strikes enemies in front of him, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Accounts Settled
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Strike enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Fiscal Fist
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Ben lifts his weapon, blocking the enemy's attack before unleashing a forward strike, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>. Successfully blocking an attack enhances the power of this skill and triggers Block Counter, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Special> to remain in the Blocking stance.
While in the Blocking stance, Ben gains a Shield that weakens over time.
After leaving the blocking stance, the Shield is removed and recovers over time.
The Shield cannot exceed 16% of Ben's Max HP.
Ben is invulnerable when activating Block.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while launching strikes.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Cashflow Counter
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Ben lifts his weapon, blocking the enemy's attacks before unleashing a forward strike, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. Successfully blocking an attack enhances the power of this skill and triggers Block Counter, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to remain in the Blocking stance.
While in the Blocking stance, Ben gains a Shield that weakens over time.
After leaving the blocking stance, the Shield is removed and recovers over time.
The Shield cannot exceed 16% of Ben's Max HP.
When this skill is activated, the Shield is restored to its maximum value.
After activating the skill, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> again to follow up with a powerful forward strike, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Ben is invulnerable when activating Block.
Ben is invulnerable while launching strikes.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Signed and Sealed
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful strike at enemies in front in a large area, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Complete Payback
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful strike at enemies in front in a large area, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
When activating the skill, additionally recover 3 Assist Points.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Joint Account
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable during the attack.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Risk Allocation
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color> when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Don't Break Contract
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Charges and strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Name: Core Passive: Guardian
Additional Ability: Contractual Agreement
Desc:
Ben's initial ATK increases along with his initial DEF. He gains <color=#2BAD00>40%</color> of his initial DEF as ATK.
When Ben launches a follow-up attack during his <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, all squad members gain a Shield of <color=#2BAD00>15%</color> of his DEF +<color=#2BAD00>100</color>, lasting for 30s.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
While the Shield from <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Guardian</color> is in effect, the character's CRIT Rate is increased by 16%.

1.Name: Reacting Force
1.Desc: When successfully Blocking an enemy with Ben's <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the DMG dealt by the blocked enemy is reduced by 30% for 15s.
1.Desc2:
"Every action has an equal and opposite reaction. So why do you have to bash things head-on?"
"Looks like your calculations are off."

2.Name: Offense Through Defense
2.Desc: When successfully triggering a Block Counter during Ben's <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, inflict an additional 300% of Ben's DEF as DMG.
2.Desc2:
Unlike other bear Thirens, Ben remains patient when fighting.
He believes if he keeps his defenses up, he can wait until the enemy reveals their weakness.

3.Name: Careful Accounting
3.Desc2: Financial responsibility demands mastering cost-efficiency and utilizing every available resource to enhance both the team and oneself.

4.Name: Agile Adaptation
4.Desc: When successfully blocking enemy DMG with Ben's invulnerable effect during his <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the following counter deals 30% more DMG.
4.Desc2:
Ben's professional accounting instincts let him adapt dynamically based on the situation.
Whether dealing with accounts or enemies, it's important to achieve the best results at the lowest cost.

5.Name: Meticulous Detail
5.Desc2: Ben's keen eye doesn't miss a single error in statements. The same goes for combat, where he gets progressively stronger as he corrects mistakes.

6.Name: Wild Spirit
6.Desc: After launching an attack or follow-up attack during Ben's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, Daze inflicted by <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, and <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> is increased by 20%, lasting 12s.
6.Desc2:
Bear Thirens are different from canine Thirens.
They can't be appeased with food alone.
When they lose their temper, the only thing you can do is run for your life...
—The discontinued "Be a Good Neighbor! 100 Tips for Getting Along With Thirens"
