Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Away From My Snacks
Special Attack: Cooling Bento
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Soukaku releases a wind current in front of her and unleashes her finishing move, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
During skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.
Holding <IconMap:Icon_Special> while using this skill allows for a quick transition to <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color>.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Fanning Mosquitoes
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Releases wind currents of extended range in front of her, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
This skill can be triggered consecutively by pressing repeatedly. Each use consumes a specified amount of Energy. When Soukaku's Energy is depleted, or you stop pressing the button, she unleashes a powerful finishing move that deals massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
During skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.
Holding <IconMap:Icon_Special> while using this skill allows for a quick transition to <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color>.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Rally!
Description.Desc:
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Soukaku plunges her weapon into the ground, morphs it into a flag, and launches <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color>, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>. Hitting an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color> triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>.
Pressing <IconMap:Icon_Normal> or <IconMap:Icon_Special> after <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color> activates a Special Attack as she retracts the flag, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
If Soukaku owns 3 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Vortex</color> on using <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color>, she consumes all 3 stacks and enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Frosted Banner</color> state. In the <color=#FFFFFF>Frosted Banner</color> state, she can unleash an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>. This effect can last up to 45s or stack up to 6 times.
Soukaku's weapon gains <color=#FFFFFF>Vortexes</color> in the following circumstances:
Gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Vortex</color> when launching an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>,
Gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Vortex</color> when launching a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>,
Gains 3 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Vortex</color> when launching an <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>.
Soukaku can accumulate a maximum of 3 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Vortex</color>.

Param.Name: Quick Fly the Flag DMG Multiplier
Quick Fly the Flag Daze Multiplier

Upon activating this skill, other squad members recover 10 Energy. The next character to switch in gains an additional 20 Energy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Additional Ability: Group Set Meal
Desc: When Soukaku launches <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color>, her ATK is increased by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color> of her initial ATK, up to 500, for 22s. When consuming <color=#FFFFFF>Vortex</color> during <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color>, the ATK increase is doubled, up to a max of 1,000. This buff can be passed along to characters switching in via <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assists</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</color> triggered by <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color>, and it refreshes the duration of the buff.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Soukaku consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Vortex</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color>, the <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> of all squad members is increased by 20% for 22s.

1.Name: Uplifting Current
1.Desc: When Soukaku triggers <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Blade Banner</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability: Group Set Meal</color>, the buff duration is increased by 8s.
1.Desc2:
When charged, the special charging module can generate a wind current of Ether energy to charge surrounding Ether devices.
To Soukaku, it's just like having a buffet with friends.
"Guys~ It's all-you-can-eat time!"

2.Name: Experimental Charging Module
2.Desc:
When Soukaku's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> hits an enemy, there's a 15% chance she gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Vortex</color>, triggering up to once per second.
When <color=#FFFFFF>Vortex</color> reaches max stacks, any additional stacks grant Soukaku 1.2 Energy instead.
2.Desc2:
A charging module is able to continuously accumulate energy during battle.
Therefore, it is regarded as an era-defining conceptual tactical weapon by the R&D department.
But for Soukaku, fully charging it simply means it's time to eat.

3.Name: Attendance Meal Allowance
3.Desc2: The best way to motivate Soukaku to train harder is simple: just increase her attendance meal allowance.

4.Name: Hypothermia
4.Desc: If an enemy is hit by <color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</color>, the target's <color=#98EFF0>Ice RES</color> is reduced by 10% for 8s.
4.Desc2: The custom-made weapon Oni Banner features a powerful built-in cooling system. Its Ether-infused catalyst generates cold air, dealing significant DMG to enemies it hits.

5.Name: Late-Night Snacks
5.Desc2: To further incentivize Soukaku to train is simple: just add a late-night snack top of the attendance meal allowance.

6.Name: Northern Wind
6.Desc: While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Frosted Banner</color> state, the number of usable enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color> and enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</color> is increased to 12, and also deal 45% more DMG.
6.Desc2: Unlocking the safety device within the blade banner allows it to operate at full capacity. It's not just for combat... it's also handy for cooling down a meal.

Additional Ability: Elegant Predator
Desc:
When Lycaon charges his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> to completion, the attack deals <color=#2BAD00>53.3%</color> increased Daze.
When <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</color> hits an enemy, the target's <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG RES</color> decreases by 25% for 30s.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Lycaon hits a Stunned enemy, the target's Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 35%.

1.Name: Full Moon Momentum
1.Desc: When Lycaon's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy, the attack's Daze increases by 12%. This effect can trigger once every 8s. When he charges his <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> to completion, this buff will increase by an additional 10%.
1.Desc2:
Records suggest that werewolves exposed to moonlight become significantly more aggressive.
"Don't stare directly at the moon."

2.Name: Energy Feedback
2.Desc: When Stunning an enemy or triggering a squad member's <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, Lycaon gains 5 Energy. Can trigger once every 1s.
2.Desc2:
"Canines receive a brief dopamine boost in their brains after completing semi-complex tasks. At that moment, if their owner pets them to show encouragement, they will be extremely happy..."
—Excerpt from the "Handbook of Unreliable Canine Research"

3.Name: Attendant Training
3.Desc2: His every gesture exudes poise, and his words and actions are as refreshing as a spring breeze. An attendant's training is about maintaining control over everything.

4.Name: Graceful Demeanor
4.Desc:
If Lycaon is attacked while using a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, he will immediately gain a Shield equal to 7.5% of his Max HP, lasting for 15s.
During the Shield's duration, his Anti-Interrupt level is increased. This effect can trigger once every 15s.
4.Desc2: "An outstanding attendant maintains a graceful demeanor at any and all times."

5.Name: Alpha Nature
5.Desc2: His glance harbors a primal ferocity, and the echoes of his howls rumble within his throat. Regardless of his current gracefulness, underneath the formal wear, he's still untamed.

6.Name: Ruthless Hunter
6.Desc: When a charged attack hits an enemy, the target suffers 10% increased DMG from Lycaon, stacking up to 5 times and lasting 12s. Only one stack can be gained per skill use, and repeated triggers reset the duration.
6.Desc2:
"Apologies, but given the circumstances, I will not show any mercy."
"After all, if a fair fight is what you are after, a Hollow is not the place to look for it."

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Lady's Bat
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Strike forward up to 4 times, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
When Lucy uses her fourth <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, the currently on-field guard boars will launch <color=#FFFFFF>Guard Boars: Spinning Swing!</color> together.

Description.Name: Guard Boars: To Arms!
Description.Desc: In combat, the guard boars will randomly use a baseball bat, boxing gloves, or a slingshot to automatically attack enemies, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Guard Boars: Spinning Swing!
Description.Desc: When Lucy uses the fourth <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, or when she gains the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> status, the guard boars will whirl their baseball bats in a continuous motion, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> to nearby enemies. If the attack cannot be executed immediately, the guard boars will remember the required number of times to execute it.

Description.Name: Dodge: Foul Ball!
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Fearless Boar!
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during dodge to activate:
Rapidly strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Returning Tusk!
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a Perfect Dodge to activate:
Strike enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Solid Hit!
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Recall a guard boar and launch it as a <color=#FFFFFF>Line Drive</color>. The guard boar will cause an explosion upon hitting enemies or walls, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Recall a guard boar and launch it as a <color=#FFFFFF>Fly Ball</color>. The guard boar will cause an explosion upon landing, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Home Run!
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Recall a guard boar and launch it as a <color=#FFFFFF>Line Drive</color>. The guard boar will cause an explosion upon hitting enemies or walls, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
When the skill hits an enemy, it triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>.
With enough Energy, hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Recall a guard boar and launch it as a <color=#FFFFFF>Fly Ball</color>. The guard boar will cause an explosion upon landing, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
When the skill hits an enemy, it triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>.

Description.Name: Cheer On!
Description.Desc: After using <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, when a guard boar triggers an explosion, it will apply the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> status to all allies, Bangboo, and the guard boars themselves. While under the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> status, allies' ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:13+AvatarSkillLevel(1)*0.8,1,2}%</color> of Lucy's initial ATK + <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:40+AvatarSkillLevel(1)*4,1,2}</color>, up to a maximum of 600. The <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> status lasts for 10s when a <color=#FFFFFF>Line Drive</color> is hit, and 15s when a <color=#FFFFFF>Fly Ball</color> is hit. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Grand Slam!
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Lucy jumps up and sends a guard boar at enemies in front in a large area, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
When the skill hits an enemy, it triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Walk-Off Home Run!
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Launch all guard boars sequentially, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> in a large area to enemies ahead.
While using this skill, other squad members recover 10 energy, and the next character to switch in gains an additional 20 energy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
When the skill hits an enemy, it triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Hit By Pitch!
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable during the attack.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Safe on Base!
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Scored a Run!
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1151004.Name: EX Special Attack: Home Run! (Line Drive)

1151005.Name: EX Special Attack: Home Run! (Fly Ball)

Name: Core Passive: Crimson Mane Guard
Additional Ability: Batter Up!
Desc: When Lucy uses her <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, a guard boar will join the battle and call in two other guard boars. The guard boars inherit Lucy's ATK, Impact, and Anomaly Proficiency. The <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> buff for the guard boars is increased to <color=#2BAD00>140%</color> of the original effect, and their attack frequency is increased.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
The guard boars inherit Lucy's CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG.

The guard boars inherit Lucy's ATK, Impact, and Anomaly Proficiency. 1.Name: Drill Formations
1.Desc: When the guard boars launch <color=#FFFFFF>Guard Boars: Spinning Swing!</color>, Lucy recovers 2 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 15s, with each guard boar having its own separate cooldown.
1.Desc2:
"Grassy, eyes right! ...That's left, you idiot!!!"
One command, two directions, three cries of pain, and wails all around.

2.Name: Little Boar Captain
2.Desc: When Lucy uses a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, it grants all squad members, Bangboo, and the guard boars the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> status for 10s.
2.Desc2:
"Without a doubt, Captain Lucy is the best leader of the Calydon Boar Thirens!"
This was Woody's conclusion in the "Sons of Calydon Annual Report."

3.Name: Ironfist Overseer
3.Desc2:
"I just wish Captain Lucy would be more gentle when she's smacking us around."
Woody thought, but didn't dare say it out loud.

4.Name: Chaos Ball Game
4.Desc: While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> state, allies' CRIT DMG is increased by an additional 10%.
4.Desc2: Rules and ribs are made to be broken.

5.Name: Wildland Princess
5.Desc2:
She speaks politely to opponents screaming under her bat.
She apologizes to enemies groveling at her feet.
This is the perfect etiquette of a noble lady.

6.Name: Fierce Fangs of Fire
6.Desc: When another squad member in the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> state hits an enemy with an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, a guard boar will drop from the sky and cause an explosion, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> equal to 300% of the guard boar's ATK. This will extend the duration of the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> buff for all squad members by 5s. The duration can increase up to 3 times, with a maximum duration of 30s. Refreshing the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> state resets the stack count. After the guard boar's explosion, it will launch <color=#FFFFFF>Guard Boars: Spinning Swing!</color>.
6.Desc2:
The little boar Thirens known as the Crimson Mane Guard are always at the forefront of battle!
Though it's hard to tell if, at the moment they're launched by the bat, they feel total despair or just accept their fate.
Brave little boars, leading the charge!

Description.Name: Basic Attack: L-Form Thundering Fist
Description.Desc:
Press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Perform up to five forward strikes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
During the 3rd hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick}, and repeatedly press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to unleash a series of melee follow-up attacks. Release the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to follow up with the 4th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.
While performing the startup light punch in the 5th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} and repeatedly press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to keep alternating between the light punch and 4th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>. Release the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to follow up with the subsequent jab combo.
Continue repeatedly pressing or holding <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to extend the duration of the jab combo.
When you stop pressing or holding <IconMap:Icon_Normal>, or when the combo reaches its maximum duration, launches a Finishing Move forward. Lighter is invulnerable during the Finishing Move.
During the 5th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, Lighter takes 40% less DMG.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, Anti-Interrupt Level is increased during the 5th hit of his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, and the DMG reduction effect is increased to 80%.

Description.Name: Dodge: Shadowed Slide
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> while the character is attacking to activate:
Perform a quick shuffle dodge in the direction of the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#Joystick}.
This skill will not interrupt the combo count for <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Charging Slam
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Rapidly strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Blazing Flash
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Strike enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using the skill, press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to immediately follow up with the 5th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Special Attack: V-Form Sunrise Uppercut
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Strikes enemies in front with an uppercut, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> during a shuffle dodge to activate:
Strike forward with a series of punches, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
This skill will not interrupt the combo count for <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: V-Form Sunrise Uppercut - Full Distance
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Leaps into the air with a powerful uppercut, striking enemies in front and dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> again during this skill to spend additional Energy to perform a powerful follow-up attack, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to follow up with the 4th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> during the shuffle dodge to activate:
Strike forward with a powerful punch combo, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
This skill will not interrupt the combo count for <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to immediately follow up with the 5th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: V-Form Sunrise Uppercut - Full Distance
Chain Attack: V-Form Scorching Sun
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful strike at enemies in front in a small area, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: W-Form Crowned Inferno
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful strike in a large area around, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Blazing Flash - Guard
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Strike enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using the skill, press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to immediately follow up with the 5th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Swift Break
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Charging Slam - Stab
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Strike enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to immediately follow up with the 5th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

1161004.Name: Special Attack: V-Form Sunrise Uppercut (Punch Combo)

1161005.Name: EX Special Attack: V-Form Sunrise Uppercut - Full Distance

1161006.Name: EX Special Attack: V-Form Sunrise Uppercut - Full Distance (Punch Combo)

Name: Core Passive: Accelerant
Additional Ability: Fighting Spirit
Desc:
Lighter automatically gains <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> over time, at a rate of 2.9 points per second. For each point of Energy consumed by any squad member, Lighter recovers an additional 0.26 <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color>, up to a maximum of 100. When <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> reaches 80, the next time Lighter switches into battle he immediately launches a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>. Once <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> is 80 or higher, executing the 5th hit of his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> puts Lighter in the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, enhancing the power of the startup light punch, jab combo, and the Finishing Move of the 5th hit of his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>. When a skill hits an enemy with its power increased, it will continuously consume <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color>. With every 10 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> consumed, Lighter's Impact increases by <color=#2BAD00>1%</color>, up to a maximum increase of <color=#2BAD00>10%</color>, and lasting 6s.
In the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, Lighter will no longer automatically gain <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> over time. If his <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> is exhausted during a startup light punch or jab combo, he will automatically follow up with a more powerful Finishing Move.
In the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, when startup light punches or jab combos hit enemies, the target's <color=#98EFF0>Ice RES</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire RES</color> are reduced by 15%, lasting 30s.
In the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, when the Finishing Move hits an enemy, it applies the <color=#FFFFFF>Collapse</color> effect on the target, extending its Stunned duration by 3s. The <color=#FFFFFF>Collapse</color> effect can trigger only once on the same target before they recover from Stun.
When the Finishing Move of the 5th hit of his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> hits an enemy, when he switches off field, or when his <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> runs out, Lighter will leave the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, keeping any unspent <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color>.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color> character or shares the same Faction:
While under the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, when the 5th hit of Lighter's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> hits an enemy, all squad members gain a stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Elation</color>, stacking up to 20 times and lasting 30s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. For each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Elation</color>, an Agent's <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> increase by 1.25%.
When obtaining <color=#FFFFFF>Elation</color>, if Lighter's Impact exceeds 170, every additional 10 points of Impact will increase the buff effect provided by each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Elation</color> by an extra 0.25%. When any squad member launches a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, it will refresh the duration of all squad members' <color=#FFFFFF>Elation</color>. <color=#FFFFFF>Elation</color> can increase the <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> of Agents by a maximum of 75%.

Name: Core Passive: Accelerant
Additional Ability: Fighting Spirit
Desc:
Lighter automatically gains <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> over time, at a rate of 2.9 points per second. For each point of Energy consumed by any squad member, Lighter recovers an additional 0.26 <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color>, up to a maximum of 100. When <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> reaches 80, the next time Lighter switches into battle he immediately launches a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>. Once <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> is 80 or higher, executing the 5th hit of his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> puts Lighter in the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, enhancing the power of the startup light punch, jab combo, and the Finishing Move of the 5th hit of his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>. When a skill hits an enemy with its power increased, it will continuously consume <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color>. With every 10 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> consumed, Lighter's Impact increases by <color=#2BAD00>1.17%</color>, up to a maximum increase of <color=#2BAD00>11.7%</color>, and lasting 6s.
In the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, Lighter will no longer automatically gain <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> over time. If his <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> is exhausted during a startup light punch or jab combo, he will automatically follow up with a more powerful Finishing Move.
In the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, when startup light punches or jab combos hit enemies, the target's <color=#98EFF0>Ice RES</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire RES</color> are reduced by 15%, lasting 30s.
In the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, when the Finishing Move hits an enemy, it applies the <color=#FFFFFF>Collapse</color> effect on the target, extending its Stunned duration by 3s. The <color=#FFFFFF>Collapse</color> effect can trigger only once on the same target before they recover from Stun.
When the Finishing Move of the 5th hit of his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> hits an enemy, when he switches off field, or when his <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> runs out, Lighter will leave the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, keeping any unspent <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color>.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color> character or shares the same Faction:
While under the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, when the 5th hit of Lighter's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> hits an enemy, all squad members gain a stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Elation</color>, stacking up to 20 times and lasting 30s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. For each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Elation</color>, an Agent's <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> increase by 1.25%.
When obtaining <color=#FFFFFF>Elation</color>, if Lighter's Impact exceeds 170, every additional 10 points of Impact will increase the buff effect provided by each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Elation</color> by an extra 0.25%. When any squad member launches a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, it will refresh the duration of all squad members' <color=#FFFFFF>Elation</color>. <color=#FFFFFF>Elation</color> can increase the <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> of Agents by a maximum of 75%.

1.Name: The Champion
1.Desc: Among the debuffs imposed by <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Accelerant</color>, the <color=#FFFFFF>Collapse</color> effect increases Stun duration by 5s, while further reducing <color=#98EFF0>Ice RES</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire RES</color> by 10%. The more powerful Finishing Move that follows when Lighter's <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> is completely exhausted during a startup light punch or jab combo deals 30% increased DMG.
1.Desc2:
Victory for the champion is crucial. By facing off against the strongest fighter from the opposing side, he eliminates the threat to his leader — bringing an immense morale uplift to the team.
For him, only victory deserves recognition.
"The Champion cannot be defeated."

2.Name: Red Scarf
2.Desc: When applying <color=#FFFFFF>Collapse</color> via <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Accelerant</color> to enemies, the target's Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 25%. The increase to <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> provided by <color=#FFFFFF>Elation</color> from <color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability: Fighting Spirit</color> increases to 120% of the original.
2.Desc2:
As the "Red Scarf" of the Sons of Calydon, Lighter is quite famous in the Outer Ring, and not just because of his fists, but also due to... his unique way of speaking.
"I enjoy taking it easy... but you wouldn't manage without me, would you?"

3.Name: Mercenary Leader
3.Desc2: "I'm probably the last person anyone should pick as their leader."

4.Name: Sunglasses
4.Desc: When Lighter is off-field, the Energy Regen for the on-field character is increased by 10%. Upon entering the <color=#FFFFFF>Morale Burst</color> state, Lighter restores 4 Energy for off-field characters. This effect can trigger once every 18s.
4.Desc2: "You're asking why I wear sunglasses? Uh... it's because I get queasy at the sight of blood, I guess."

5.Name: Decision Maker
5.Desc2:
"Give me an order, and I'll carry it out. It's that simple."
Lighter adjusted his sunglasses with a carefree smile.
"Just don't put me in charge of making decisions."

6.Name: Survivor
6.Desc: Lighter's <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> recovery efficiency is increased to 200% of its original value. When Lighter lands a heavy strike on enemies during a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, it will trigger the <color=#FFFFFF>Blazing Impact</color> effect, dealing 250% of ATK as <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. This effect can trigger once every 8s on each enemy. If Lighter's Impact exceeds 170 points, each additional point will further increase the multiplier of <color=#FFFFFF>Blazing Impact</color> by 5%, up to a maximum increase of 500%. The more powerful Finishing Move that follows when Lighter's <color=#FFFFFF>Morale</color> is completely exhausted during a light punch or jab combo will trigger an additional activation of <color=#FFFFFF>Blazing Impact</color> when hitting an enemy, ignoring the effect's cooldown.
6.Desc2:
If given the chance to do it all over again, he would never opt to be the only survivor.
Unfortunately, fate is rarely a choice.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Direct Flame Blend
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 5 attacks in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Mixed Flame Blend
Description.Desc:
In the <color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</color> state, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Spin continuously while spraying flames around, followed by a Finishing Move that inflicts <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. Continuing to hold extends the flame-spraying duration.
When the move is activated, it consumes 20 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>;
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.
After executing the Finishing Move, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to immediately follow up with <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: Fiery Phantom Dash
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Dangerous Fermentation
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Perform a forward rush attack with the flamethrower, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Fluttering Steps
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Launch a series of attacks on enemies in front while spraying flames, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Intense Heat Aging Method
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Unleash a fire blast forward, inflicting <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>;
Press and hold <IconMap:Icon_Special> to charge, boosting the move's power.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method
Description.Desc:
With enough energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Continuously spray flames with a one-handed flamethrower, then release a fire blast in a straight line ahead, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. Continue holding to steadily consume energy and extend the spray's duration.
While continuously spraying, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to execute a sidestep dodge, adjusting your position in the corresponding direction.
Anti-Interrupt Level is increased while continuously spraying, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.
Character is invulnerable during sidestep dodge and fire blast.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot
Description.Desc:
While using <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method</color>, with enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Use both flamethrowers to continuously spray flames, followed by a fire blast in a front line, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. Keep holding to continue consuming Energy and extend the spray's duration.
Character is invulnerable during the moment the spray is activated and during the activation of the fire blast.
Anti-Interrupt Level is increased while spraying, and DMG received is reduced by 40%.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Intense Heat Aging Method
EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method
EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot
Chain Attack: Fuel-Fed Flame
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Quickly dash forward while spraying flames in all directions, then launch a fire blast in a fan-shaped area ahead, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using the skill, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to immediately follow up with <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Glorious Inferno
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Dash forward quickly, then leap into the air and continuously spray flames over a wide area ahead, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
When leaping into the air, a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> will be triggered. If the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is activated, Burnice will extend the duration of her flame spray.
Upon activation, recover 50 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Energizing Specialty Drink
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Unleash a flurry of attacks on enemies in front while spraying flames, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Smoky Cauldron
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Scorching Dew
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Leap into the air and quickly spin forward while spraying flames in all directions, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using the skill, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to immediately follow up with <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>.

1171003.Name: Special Attack: Intense Heat Aging Method

1171004.Name: EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method

1171005.Name: EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot
1171005.Desc: <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> (During EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method)

Name: Core Passive: Nitro-Fuel Cocktail
Additional Ability: Fire Kindling
Desc:
When Burnice expends Energy, she accumulates <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>, up to a max of 100. She gains 1.4 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color> for each 1 point of Energy consumed. At 50 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>, she enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</color> state until all <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color> is expended. Upon entering the battlefield, Burnice instantly accumulates 100 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</color> state, when Burnice hits an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Mixed Flame Blend</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, she applies the <color=#FFFFFF>Scorched</color> effect to the target until she exits the <color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</color> state. When other squad members hit enemies under the <color=#FFFFFF>Scorched</color> status, it triggers the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect, expending 8 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color> to deal <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> equal to <color=#2BAD00>175%</color> of Burnice's ATK and accumulate <color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</color>. This effect can trigger once every 1.5s. For every 10 Anomaly Proficiency, <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> DMG increases by 1%, up to a max of 30%. DMG from the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect is considered <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Attack</color> DMG.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character or shares the same Faction:
When Burnice's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Mixed Flame Blend</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color> hits an enemy, or when the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect is triggered, the move's accumulated <color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</color> increases by 65%. When any squad member applies the <color=#FF5521>Burn</color> effect to an enemy, the duration of that effect is extended by 3s.

1.Name: Kindred Flames
1.Desc: Increases the limit of <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color> from 100 to 140. Upon entering the battlefield, Burnice accumulates an additional 40 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>. Increases the DMG Multiplier of the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect by 100% of Burnice's ATK. Additionally, the accumulated <color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</color> from the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect is increased by 25%.
1.Desc2:
"Everyone has rough times; it's perfectly normal!"
"Cheer up, Caesar! How about a Nitro-Fuel special? I added a ton of sugar!"

2.Name: Extra at No Additional Charge
2.Desc: When triggering the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect, <color=#FFFFFF>Thermal Penetration</color> is applied to the enemy, stacking up to 5 times and lasting 6s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. When any allied unit in the squad hits the enemy, the attack's PEN Ratio is increased by 4% for each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Thermal Penetration</color>, up to a max of 20%.
2.Desc2:
As the mixologist for the Sons of Calydon, Burnice takes great pleasure in crafting the best Nitro-Fuel drinks in New Eridu for her friends.
Of course, if you happen to be her enemy... you might have the opportunity to try a new and unique flavor too.
"It's a once-in-a-lifetime, absolutely exquisite taste!"

3.Name: Optimistic by Nature
3.Desc2:
"That Burnice, she's always so full of energy! Even right after waking up! I have no idea where she gets all that energy..."
"What's even scarier is that she can get everyone around her to be just as enthusiastic! It's almost like she's some kind of monster!"
"But... I don't really dislike it, to be honest..."
— From a boar manager who wishes to remain unnamed

4.Name: Ultimate Fuel Supply
4.Desc: When an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Attack</color> hits an enemy, the move's CRIT Rate increases by 30%. The max flame spray duration of <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color> is increased by 1s.
4.Desc2:
"You like the drink I mixed? Thanks! Steeltusk likes them too~ That guy can drink 200 liters in one go!"
"Oh, Steeltusk is our big truck!"
"Wanna try some of its special fuel? It's pretty fiery~"

5.Name: Dance of Fire and Ice
5.Desc2:
When mixing drinks, ice is a crucial element.
Without an intense chill, the intense heat just doesn't stand out.
"That fusion of fire and ice~ It's truly captivating!"

6.Name: Burning Invitation
6.Desc: When Burnice hits an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>, it triggers an additional special <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect, dealing 60% of Burnice's ATK as <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> to the target. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s and does not consume <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>. After hitting an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>, while the move is active, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>, special <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effects, and <color=#FF5521>Burn</color> effects will ignore 25% of the target's <color=#FF5521>Fire RES</color>. When <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>'s fire blast hits an enemy, if that enemy is <color=#FF5521>Burned</color>, trigger an additional instance of <color=#FF5521>Burn</color> DMG equal to 1,800% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 20s for each target.
6.Desc2:
It seems like no one has ever seen Burnice truly angry.
"Trust me, you don't want to see it."
— From a driver getting ready to sleep atop Steeltusk

Description.Name: Basic Attack: High-Pressure Spike
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 attacks, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
While launching <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to attack while moving. This allows Grace to reposition herself and deal <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
While Grace is launching <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>, her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> combo will not be interrupted by her <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attacks</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attacks</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: Safety Regulation
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Quick Inspection
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slide forward while shooting, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Violation Penalty
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Throws a grenade at enemies, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Obstruction Removal
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Throws a grenade to the front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Upon use, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to change directions.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Supercharged Obstruction Removal
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Leap in the air and throw two grenades to the front, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Upon use, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to change directions.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Supercharged Obstruction Removal
Chain Attack: Collaborative Construction
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Throws three grenades into the air then strafes to detonate them, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Demolition Blast - Beware
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Throws a custom grenade which explodes in the air and splits into four smaller grenades, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Incident Management
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched in the air, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Throws a grenade at the enemy, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Evasive Assist: Rapid Risk Response
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Dodges the enemy's attack and activates <color=#FFFFFF>Vital View</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Counter Volt Needle
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after an <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color> to activate:
Unleashes a spinning hail of bullets against enemies in front and throws a grenade, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1181003.Name: EX Special Attack: Supercharged Obstruction Removal

Name: Core Passive: Pre-Driven Needle
Additional Ability: Tech Support Dept.
Desc: When Grace's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> hits an enemy and deals <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>, she gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color> (up to 8 stacks). Upon reaching maximum stacks, using a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> will consume all stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color>, increasing the accumulated <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color> by <color=#2BAD00>65%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Upon hitting an enemy with an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the next <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> effect inflicted on the target increases <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> DMG by 18%. This effect can stack up to 2 times, and each enemy can trigger it once per skill use. Resets when the <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> effect ends.

Additional Ability: Tech Support Dept.
Desc: When Grace's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> hits an enemy and deals <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>, she gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color> (up to 8 stacks). Upon reaching maximum stacks, using a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> will consume all stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color>, increasing the accumulated <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color> by <color=#2BAD00>119.1%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Upon hitting an enemy with an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the next <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> effect inflicted on the target increases <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> DMG by 18%. This effect can stack up to 2 times, and each enemy can trigger it once per skill use. Resets when the <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> effect ends.

Name: Core Passive: Pre-Driven Needle
Additional Ability: Tech Support Dept.
Desc: When Grace's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> hits an enemy and deals <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>, she gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color> (up to 8 stacks). Upon reaching maximum stacks, using a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> will consume all stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color>, increasing the accumulated <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color> by <color=#2BAD00>130%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Upon hitting an enemy with an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the next <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> effect inflicted on the target increases <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> DMG by 18%. This effect can stack up to 2 times, and each enemy can trigger it once per skill use. Resets when the <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> effect ends.

1.Name: Recharge Chamber
1.Desc:
When the 4th hit of Grace's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> hits an enemy, all squad members gain 0.25 Energy.
Within the same move, this effect can grant a max of 2 Energy to all squad members.
1.Desc2: Efficiency is the lifeblood of engineering, and within Grace's gun barrel resonates its heartbeat.

2.Name: Lightning Piercer
2.Desc: When Grace's thrown grenade hits an enemy during a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the target's <color=#2EB6FF>Electric RES</color> is reduced by 8.5%, and <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup RES</color> is reduced by 8.5%, lasting for 8s.
2.Desc2:
"Dissecting" complex mechanical structures is Grace's greatest hobby, even in the midst of battle.
How does it feel to get taken apart, with every vulnerability laid bare?

3.Name: Chief Mechanic
3.Desc2:
Grace was personally involved in writing the "Belobog Industries' Construction Safety Guidelines."
She's also the employee who violated the "no dangerous explosives at construction sites" policy the most times.

4.Name: Burst Capacitor
4.Desc: When Grace uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, she gains 6 stacks of Charge (max 6 stacks). When her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> hits an enemy, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, increasing her Energy Generation Rate of the attack by 20%.
4.Desc2:
Anton suspected within the component Grace referred to as the "Electropulse Recycling Module," there was, in fact, an Ether hamster tirelessly generating energy around the clock.
"Can you equip my bro with one too?"

5.Name: "Frosty Cold Iron Witch"
5.Desc2: The "Frosty Cold Iron Witch" is capable of taming any mechanical beast, or at least that's what the anonymous fan who came up with the name thinks.

6.Name: Detonation Trigger
6.Desc: When all <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color> stacks are consumed to activate a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, Grace's skill is enhanced, tossing an extra grenade and increasing each grenade's DMG to 200%.
6.Desc2:
The average blood temperature of Belobog Heavy Industries' employees is ninety-eight degrees Celsius. Grace is often viewed as the safety valve keeping them all from boiling.
When even Grace gives up control, it's a sign for everyone to cover their ears.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Saw Teeth Trimming
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 3 attacks, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Press repeatedly or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during the 3rd attack to extend the skill duration.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming
Description.Desc:
While <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze</color> is active, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Launch up to 3 attacks at enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Each attack consumes 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color>.
Press repeatedly or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during the 3rd attack to extend the skill duration.

Description.Name: Dodge: Vortex
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A rapid dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
When <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> is triggered, Ellen gains the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Charge</color> effect, reducing the charge time of <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, lasting up to 5 seconds or until it triggers.

Description.Name: Dash: Roaming Hunt
Description.Desc:
Hold or double-press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
Enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</color> state, allowing dashing movement.
In the <color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</color> state, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to control Ellen's direction, and release to stop.
Ellen is invulnerable for a brief time after activation.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush
Description.Desc:
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</color> state, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Delivers a spinning slash to enemies before opening her scissors for a Swift Scissors strike, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Gain 1 point of <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> when the Swift Scissors strike hits.

While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</color> state, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Perform a spinning slash against the enemy, then pull apart the scissors to unleash a Charged Scissors strike, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Gain 3 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> when the Charged Scissors strike hits. If the enemy is <color=#98EFF0>Frozen</color>, it always triggers <color=#98EFF0>Shatter</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while charging the skill, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Flash Freeze
Description.Desc: When Ellen has <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</color>, the <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze</color> effect is activated. Once <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze</color> activates, <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</color> expend <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</color>, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>. Ellen can have up to a maximum of 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</color>.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Monstrous Wave
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Launches a dashing slash attack at enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Cold Snap
Description.Desc:
While <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze</color> is active, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during dodge to activate:
Launches a dashing slash attack at enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Consumes 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Reef Rock
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Rapidly move through enemies with open scissors for a cutting strike, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Param.Name: Swift Scissors Flash Freeze Charge Obtained
Charged Scissors Flash Freeze Charge Obtained

Description.Name: Special Attack: Drift
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Use a quick tail sweep attack in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Tail Swipe
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Perform a forceful tail whip attack that deals massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> upon striking an enemy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After executing the move, you can immediately follow up with the 3rd hit of a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Sharknami
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy and after executing <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Tail Swipe</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Perform a powerful series of slashes ahead that deal massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> upon striking an enemy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After executing the move, you can immediately follow up with the 3rd hit of a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Avalanche
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Crash down from above and unleash an ice storm, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Endless Winter
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Crash down from above and unleash an ice storm before a powerful scissor strike, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Shark Sentinel
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Speedily move through the enemy with open scissors for a cutting strike, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
When the character on the field is launched, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} and press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</color> state, enabling dashing movement.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Roaming</color> state, use the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to change directions and release to stop.
Character is invulnerable briefly when triggering the skill.
Upon triggering a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, Ellen gains the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Charge</color> effect, shortening the charging time of <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, lasting up to 5s or until it triggers once.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Wavefront Impact
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Shark Cruiser
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Charge and slash enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>.
Press repeatedly or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during the attack to extend the skill duration.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Name: Core Passive: Sharp-Toothed
Additional Ability: Rising Storm
Desc: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>50%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

Additional Ability: Rising Storm
Desc: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>58.3%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

Additional Ability: Rising Storm
Desc: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>75%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

Name: Core Passive: Sharp-Toothed
Additional Ability: Rising Storm
Desc: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>83.3%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

Name: Core Passive: Sharp-Toothed
Additional Ability: Rising Storm
Desc: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>91.6%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

Name: Core Passive: Sharp-Toothed
Additional Ability: Rising Storm
Desc: When Ellen launches a Charged Scissors Strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, or consumes a <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color>, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>100%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Ellen deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color>, subsequent <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

1.Name: Glacial Omen
1.Desc: Upon hitting an enemy with a Swift Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, the obtained <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</color> are increased to 3. Upon hitting an enemy with a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color>, the obtained <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</color> are increased to 6. For each <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> consumed, Ellen's CRIT Rate is increased by 2% for 15s, stacking up to 6 times. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
1.Desc2:
Chilling winds are an omen of winter, and a signal that Ellen is about to apply for extended leave to hibernate.
Speaking of which, do sharks actually need to hibernate?

2.Name: Arctic Ocean Predator
2.Desc: The 3rd hit of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming</color> can be directly followed up with <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Sharknami</color>. For each point of <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charge</color> when using an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the current attack's CRIT DMG is increased by 20%, up to a max of 60%.
2.Desc2:
Despite being freshly stained with red, the massive shears held by Ellen lacked any trace of warmth.
The icy cold stems from her iron-forged instrument, as well as the fear of facing a predator such as herself.

3.Name: Overtime-Intolerant
3.Desc2:
The whole point of "efficiency" is being able to go home early and sleep.
So strike harder and strike faster.

4.Name: Endless Hoarfrost
4.Desc: Whenever a squad member <color=#98EFF0>Freezes</color> or Stuns an enemy, Ellen gains 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Freeze Charges</color> and the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Charge</color> effect. She also recovers 4 Energy. The Energy recovery effect can trigger once per 10s.
4.Desc2:
A relentless assault of piercing cold. Terrifying monstrosities will learn the beauty and cruelty of winter under Ellen's blade.
But, actually, the endless work that maids have during holidays is far more cruel...

5.Name: Adequate Sleep
5.Desc2:
Except for when in the toughest of battles, Ellen always seems to have that "I can fall asleep at any moment" look.
Many an enemy has met their demise after underestimating Ellen because of it.

6.Name: The Feast Begins
6.Desc: When Ellen uses an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or gains <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Charge</color>, her PEN Ratio increases by 20% for 6s. She also gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>The Feast Begins</color>, up to a maximum of 3 stacks. With 3 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>The Feast Begins</color>, using a Charged Scissors strike during <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush</color> consumes all stacks, increasing the DMG of the current attack by 250%.
6.Desc2: An open wound, a drop of blood. A thrilling hunt, a grand feast. A fragile life, a moment of satisfaction.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Launch up to five piercing attacks ahead, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the 5th hit of the Basic Attack hits an enemy, it generates 2 <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color>.
After activating a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, the next time Harumasa activates the 5th hit of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer</color> and hits an enemy with it, it generates 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer - Drift
Description.Desc:
During <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer</color>, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} and press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Shoot a ranged piercing attack and reposition towards the corresponding drag direction, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Falling Feather
Description.Desc:
After the 5th hit of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer</color>, a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, or a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, hold <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Immediately shoot <color=#FFFFFF>Falling Feather</color> at enemies ahead, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to aim at a target and release <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
After drawing the bowstring and aiming, shoot <color=#FFFFFF>Falling Feather</color> at the target, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Ha-Oto no Ya
Description.Desc:
When the 5th hit of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer</color>/<color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>/<color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> hits an enemy or the ground, it can generate 2/6/6 <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color>. If there are no <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color> on the field when any squad member applies an Attribute Anomaly to an enemy, generate 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color>. This effect can trigger once every 12s.
There can be up to 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color> present at a time. If there are any <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color> present when Harumasa fires and hits enemies with <color=#FFFFFF>Falling Feather</color>, the <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color> will activate and fire <color=#FFFFFF>Ha-Oto no Ya</color> at the enemies hit by <color=#FFFFFF>Falling Feather</color>, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
<color=#FFFFFF>Ha-Oto no Ya</color> will apply <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color> to enemies hit, stacking up to 8 times and lasting 10s, repeated triggers reset the duration. While a target has at least 2 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color>, they will be <color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: Quick Flash
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Launch multiple piercing attacks ahead, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Hidden Edge
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Pierces enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash
Description.Desc:
While there are <color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</color> enemies on the field, Harumasa will enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Awakened</color> state, switching <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru</color> for <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color>.

While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Awakened</color> state, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Rush forwards to the closest <color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</color> enemy and execute a powerful slash, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the slash hits the target, it consumes 2 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color>. With less than 2 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</color> will be removed from the enemy. Before <color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</color> is removed, repeatedly press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to repeatedly use <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color>. While no <color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</color> enemies exist on the field, Harumasa leaves the <color=#FFFFFF>Awakened</color> state.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Awakened</color> state, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Falling Feather</color> to quickly follow up with <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color>.
During skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash
Special Attack: Nowhere to Hide
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Launch an arrow forward, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Nowhere to Run
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Launch daggers and an enhanced arrow ahead, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the enhanced arrow hits an enemy or the ground, it generates 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Nowhere to Run
Chain Attack: Kai - Hanare
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleash a piercing attack on enemies in a large area ahead then fire an enhanced arrow, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the arrow hits the ground, it generates 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Zanshin
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleash a piercing attack on enemies in a large area ahead, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Braced Bow
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Unleash a piercing attack at enemies ahead, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Yugamae
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Yugamae - Slash
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Unleash a series of slashes at enemies ahead, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1201001.Name: Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer (1st, 2nd, and 3rd hit)

1201002.Name: Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer (4th and 5th hit)

1201006.Name: EX Special Attack: Nowhere to Run

1201008.Name: Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash

1201009.Name: Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash (Quick launch)

Name: Core Passive: Day Break
Additional Ability: Overclock
Desc: The CRIT Rate of <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>10.6%</color>, and when Harumasa's <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color> triggers a critical hit against an enemy, he gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</color>, for up to a maximum of 3 stacks per use of the skill and stacking up to 6 times, lasting 5s, repeated triggers reset the duration. Each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</color> increases the CRIT DMG of <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color> by <color=#2BAD00>6%</color>.

When another character in your squad is a <color=#FFFFFF>Stun</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character:
When Harumasa's attacks hit Stunned enemies or enemies under Attribute Anomaly, his DMG increases by 40%. When Harumasa's <color=#FFFFFF>Falling Feather</color> hits Stunned enemies or enemies under Attribute Anomaly, it will apply 2 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color> to the target.

Additional Ability: Overclock
Desc: The CRIT Rate of <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>25%</color>, and when Harumasa's <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color> triggers a critical hit against an enemy, he gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</color>, for up to a maximum of 3 stacks per use of the skill and stacking up to 6 times, lasting 5s, repeated triggers reset the duration. Each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</color> increases the CRIT DMG of <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color> by <color=#2BAD00>12%</color>.
