1.Name: "High Spirit"
1.Desc: The maximum stack limit of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color> from <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Ha-Oto no Ya</color> increases to 14 stacks. When an <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quiver</color> is triggered, 2 consecutive <color=#FFFFFF>Ha-Oto no Ya</color> will be fired at the target.
1.Desc2:
"I'm not like some stubborn idiots who insist on facing the enemy head-on."
"Be it a straightforward assault or an underhanded attack from the shadows, anything that gets me off work earlier is good in my eyes~"

2.Name: Languish
2.Desc: When using an <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, Harumasa gains 7 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Blitz</color>, up to a max of 7 stacks. While possessing <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Blitz</color>, the DMG of <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color> increases by 50%. Consume 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Blitz</color> once <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color> ends.
2.Desc2:
"Don't look at me like that, I'm actually real frail, y'know~"
Harumasa lazily sprawls across his office desk.
"So... how 'bout picking someone else for this mission?"

3.Name: White Lies
3.Desc2:
"...Don't worry, this isn't enough to kill me."
He wipes the blood from the corner of his mouth with a smile and readies his bow once more.
"After all, I'm going to live to make it everyone's problem."

4.Name: Occasionally Motivated
4.Desc: <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color> now lasts for 20s. When <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color> hits enemies, Harumasa gains 30 Decibels once per use of this skill. Upon activating <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, apply the maximum stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color> to all on-field enemies.
4.Desc2:
Harumasa is occasionally full of energy and motivation...
When there's only five minutes left until he can get off work.

5.Name: No One Knows
5.Desc2:
"I want vacations, freedom, to be happy every day!"
"Just kidding. I want to live."

6.Name: Tacit Understanding
6.Desc: After <color=#FFFFFF>Ha-Oto no Ya</color> hits Stunned enemies or enemies under Attribute Anomalies, Harumasa will ignore 15% of the target's <color=#2EB6FF>Electric RES</color> for 12s. Every 12 times an enemy is hit by <color=#FFFFFF>Ha-Oto no Ya</color>, trigger an extra electromagnetic explosion, dealing 1,500% of Harumasa's ATK to the target as <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
6.Desc2:
"My master taught me a lot of things, like how to draw a bow, how to wield a blade, and how to survive in this world with this body of mine."
"...What happened after that?"
"Well, after that... he left me."

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Whack the Dimwit
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Order Drusilla and Anastella to attack up to 4 times, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Performing other actions with Rina during Drusilla and Anastella's attacks will not interrupt Rina's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> combo count.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Shoo the Fool
Description.Desc:
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> or <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Calls back Drusilla and Anastella to swing them around for a ranged attack, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dodge: Dress Adjustment
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Sudden Surprise
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Order Drusilla and Anastella to execute a piercing attack, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Bangboo Callback
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Order Drusilla and Anastella to spin forward and trigger an explosion, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Beat the Blockhead
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Order Anastella to execute a downward smash, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Dimwit Disappearing Trick
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Order Drusilla and Anastella to execute multiple downward smashes, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Dimwit Disappearing Trick
Chain Attack: Code of Conduct
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Order Drusilla and Anastella to push forward and generate a ball-shaped electrical field that deals massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
During this skill, Drusilla and Anastella are unable to perform <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attacks</color>, and <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attacks</color>, but can be recalled to Rina's side through <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shoo the Fool</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.

Description.Name: Ultimate: The Queen's Attendants
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Order Drusilla and Anastella to spin forward, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
During this skill, Drusilla and Anastella are unable to respond to <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> commands, but can be recalled to Rina's side through <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shoo the Fool</color>.
Upon activating this skill, the other squad members recover 10 Energy. The next character to switch in recovers an additional 20 Energy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Duple Meter Allemande
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Order Drusilla and Anastella to spin forward and trigger an explosion, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Evasive Assist: Triple Meter Courante
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Dodges the enemy's attack and activates <color=#FFFFFF>Vital View</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Quadruple Meter Gavotte
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after an <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color> to activate:
Order Drusilla and Anastella to push forward and generate an electrical vortex, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1211004.Name: EX Special Attack: Dimwit Disappearing Trick

Name: Core Passive: Mini Destruction Partner
Additional Ability: Banquet of Perfection
Desc: When ordering Drusilla or Anastella to attack, other squad members' PEN Ratio increases together with Rina's, by 25% of Rina's PEN Ratio + <color=#2BAD00>6%</color>, up to 30%. The effect ends when both Drusilla and Anastella return to Rina.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Increases the duration of <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> inflicted on enemies by any character by 3s. When <color=#2EB6FF>Shocked</color> enemies are on the field, all squad members' <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> increases by 10%.

1.Name: Dance Duet
1.Desc:
After being sent out to launch an attack, Drusilla and Anastella stay in place for an additional 5.5s before returning to Rina.
The effect gained from <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Mini Destruction Partner</color> by characters within 10m is increased to 130% of the original value.
1.Desc2:
"Get your work done, or you're in for a beating!" is how Drusilla tries to encourage everyone.
"Yeah, a beating!" Anastella always chimes in.

2.Name: Master's Paragon
2.Desc: Upon entering combat or switching in, Rina's DMG increases by 15% for 12s. This effect can trigger once every 18s.
2.Desc2: "It takes an excellent head maid to lead excellent maids, and an exemplary master to raise exemplary Bangboo." — Excerpt from Rina's speech at the "Victoria Housekeeping Human Resource Management and Bangboo Training Insight Seminar."

3.Name: Head Maid's Specialty
3.Desc2:
Rina always has the confidence to excel at anything and the ability to annihilate everything.
However, when it comes to being in the mood to annihilate enemies, both her confidence and capability align.

4.Name: Needle and Hammer
4.Desc: Rina's Energy Regen increases by 0.5/s when both Drusilla and Anastella are deployed. The effect ends when Drusilla or Anastella returns to Rina.
4.Desc2:
Drusilla and Anastella can never agree on anything.
"Beating up the dummy in front" is an exception.

5.Name: Head Maid Perfectionist
5.Desc2:
"Rina" means perfection in the Bangboo language.
Perfectionism is the number one rule in the Victoria Housekeeping handbook.
And Rina has her own criteria for judging "perfection."

6.Name: Stormy Night's Fright
6.Desc: When an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> hits an enemy, the entire squad's <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> is increased by 15% for 8s.
6.Desc2:
Thunder rumbles in the old castle on a rainy night. The depths of the long corridors are filled with eerie shadows.
Fear circuits overloaded, the filming of a thriller commences.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Tsukuyomi Kagura
Description.Desc:
Yanagi has two stances: <color=#FFFFFF>Jougen</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Kagen</color>.
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Execute up to five forward slashes based on the current stance, causing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
During combat, Yanagi gains the corresponding stance buff based on her current stance:
<color=#FFFFFF>Jougen</color> stance buff: <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> increases by 10%. Anti-Interrupt Level increases during <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>.
<color=#FFFFFF>Kagen</color> stance buff: PEN Ratio increases by 10%. Interrupt Level increases for <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>.
For 8s after switching stances, Yanagi retains the bonus from the previous stance.

Description.Name: Dodge: Wandering Breeze
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Fleeting Flight
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Rapid Retaliation
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, you can immediately follow up with the 3rd hit of the current stance's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Ruten
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Perform a forward slash, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>, and switch the current stance.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.
If activated after the 3rd, 4th, or 5th hit of a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, it activates <color=#FFFFFF>Swift Ruten</color>, speeding up the slashes while switching her current stance.
Block enemy attacks while <color=#FFFFFF>Swift Ruten</color> is active.
Upon activating <color=#FFFFFF>Swift Ruten</color>, Yanagi can immediately follow up with the 3rd hit of the current stance's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Gekka Ruten
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Charge up power for a quick forward thrust, followed by a downward attack, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Upon executing the thrust, Yanagi switches stances and enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Shinrabanshou</color> state, lasting 15s. For the duration of this state, when following up with a subsequent <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> from the 5th hit of a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or other skills, the combo will begin directly from the 3rd hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.
If the downward attack hits an enemy suffering an Anomaly, it triggers a special <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> effect, <color=#FFFFFF>Polarity Disorder</color>, dealing 15% of the original <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> effect's DMG to the target, plus an additional <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:5+AvatarSkillLevel(1)*2.25,100,2}%</color> of Yanagi's Anomaly Proficiency. <color=#FFFFFF>Polarity Disorder</color> will not remove the target's Anomaly.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Celestial Harmony
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Switch stances and unleash a powerful slash on enemies in front, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, you can immediately follow up with the 3rd hit of the current stance's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Raiei Tenge
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Yanagi unleashes her potential and delivers a powerful slash to a large area of enemies in front in a very short time, followed by an additional lightning strike, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the lightning strike hits an enemy affected by an Attribute Anomaly, it triggers a special <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> effect called <color=#FFFFFF>Polarity Disorder</color>. This deals DMG equal to 15% of the original <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> effect plus an additional <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:5+AvatarSkillLevel(3)*2.25,100,2}%</color> of Yanagi's Anomaly Proficiency. <color=#FFFFFF>Polarity Disorder</color> will not remove the target's Anomaly.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, Yanagi can immediately follow up with the 3rd hit of the current stance's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Blade of Elegance
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, you can immediately follow up with the 3rd hit of the current stance's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Radiant Reversal
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Weeping Willow Stab
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Switch stances, and quickly deliver multiple slashes to enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, you can immediately follow up with the 3rd hit of the current stance's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Name: Core Passive: Lunar Eclipse
Additional Ability: Gessou
Desc:
After Yanagi activates her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the DMG multiplier of <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> is increased by <color=#2BAD00>125%</color> when any squad member applies the <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> effect to an enemy, lasting 15s.
When her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy, Yanagi's <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> against the target is increased by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color> for 15s.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character or shares the same attribute:
After switching stances, when Yanagi hits an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Tsukuyomi Kagura</color>, <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color> increases by 45% for 8s.

1.Name: Know Thy Self, Know Thy Enemy
1.Desc: When any squad member inflicts an Anomaly on an enemy, Yanagi gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Clarity</color>, lasting 15s, stacking up to 3 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Upon being hit by an enemy attack, Yanagi consumes 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Clarity</color> to gain invulnerability for 1s. When Yanagi has 1 or more stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Clarity</color>, her Anomaly Proficiency increases by 80.
1.Desc2:
"Having the clarity to see your enemy's weakness is like an extra safety net... and it increases your chances at victory."
Yanagi adjusts her glasses, remaining as composed as ever, even when victory is already assured.

2.Name: Outstanding Adaptability
2.Desc: During her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the rapid thrust's <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color> increases by 20%. Holding down the Special Attack button after a rapid thrust hits an enemy will consume 10 additional Energy to launch another thrust. If Energy is insufficient or the button is released, the attack automatically follows up with the downward attack. When the downward attack hits an enemy suffering an Anomaly and triggers <color=#FFFFFF>Polarity Disorder</color>, the DMG multiplier increases to 20% of the original <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> effect. Each additional thrust increases this multiplier by 15%, up to a maximum of 2 extra thrusts.
2.Desc2:
"Yanagi can handle any unfamiliar environment thrown her way."
"I believe in her more than I believe in myself."
— From a martial artist practicing "the cutting of fallen leaves."

3.Name: Tsukishiro Style Management
3.Desc2: Everyone says Section 6 is gathering oddballs and geniuses, with Tsukishiro Yanagi being the only "normal" one. But it's precisely her presence that holds the oddballs and geniuses together.

4.Name: Chessmaster
4.Desc: When Yanagi inflicts Attribute Anomaly DMG on an enemy, they suffer the <color=#FFFFFF>Exposed</color> effect, lasting 15s. Attacks on enemies under the <color=#FFFFFF>Expose</color> effect will have 16% increased PEN Ratio.
4.Desc2: No matter the situation, Tsukishiro Yanagi can rapidly grasp all the information at hand and make the most appropriate decision.

5.Name: "Other Mother"
5.Desc2:
At present, Tsukishiro Yanagi is the sole designated guardian of Soukaku.
"Soukaku, this is the Chief's riceball, you mustn't eat it... forget it, come here, I'll heat it up for you."
"We'll just buy a similar one for the Chief later."

6.Name: Inhuman Blood
6.Desc: After a thrust attack during her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the duration of the <color=#FFFFFF>Shinrabanshou</color> state increases to 30s. While the state is active, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> DMG increases by 20%. The maximum number of times the additional DMG multiplier increase effect for <color=#FFFFFF>Polarity Disorder</color> in <color=#FFFFFF>Outstanding Adaptability</color> can be triggered increases to 4, and the Energy cost for the first 4 additional thrust attacks is halved.
6.Desc2:
Flowing through Tsukishiro Yanagi's veins is blood that isn't entirely her own. This blood once granted her new life in the face of despair, and with it, she gained certain special powers.
"But as you know, something that isn't mine... comes with a price."

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Don't Move!
Description.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>[Assault Mode]</color>
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate.
Unleash a flurry of martial arts, bullets, and Ether Buckshots in a series of up to 5 attacks, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
When the 4th or 5th hit strikes an enemy, obtain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshell</color> per hit. A max of 1 can be obtained per activation of this Basic Attack.
While using this skill, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} and press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Firepower Offensive</color> and readjust to face the selected direction.
While under <color=#FFFFFF>Assault Mode</color>, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to switch to <color=#FFFFFF>Suppressive Mode</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Please Do Not Resist
Description.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>[Suppressive Mode]</color>
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleash up to 3 Shotshell piercing attacks, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>. If Zhu Yuan has <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color> upon firing, 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshell</color> will be consumed, dealing massive <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
While using this skill, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to activate her <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Overwhelming Firepower</color> and readjust to face the selected direction.
While in <color=#FFFFFF>Suppressive Mode</color>, release <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to return to <color=#FFFFFF>Assault Mode</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Please Do Not Resist
Dodge: Tactical Detour
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Firepower Offensive
Description.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Assault Mode</color>
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Uses handgun to attack, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Overwhelming Firepower
Description.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Suppressive Mode</color>
Drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} during <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Please Do Not Resist</color> to activate:
Unleashes a Shotshell piercing attack, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>. If Zhu Yuan has <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color> when firing, 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshell</color> will be consumed, dealing massive <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Fire Blast
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate.
Shoots enemies in front with an Ether Buckshot, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshell</color> on skill use.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Buckshot Blast
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Shoots Ether Buckshots that deal <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>. This can be repeated 3 times by repeatedly pressing <IconMap:Icon_Special>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Full Barrage
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Shoots a series of Ether Buckshots, that explode and deal massive <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Upon activation, gain 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Eradication Mode
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Uses Modified Master Firearm to execute a saturated attack, firing lasers and seeking missiles to deal massive <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Upon activation, gain 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Max Eradication Mode
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Uses Modified Master Firearm to execute a saturated attack, firing lasers and seeking missiles to deal massive <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Upon activation, gain 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Covering Shot
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Shoots enemies in front with an Ether Buckshot, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshell</color> on skill use.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Evasive Assist: Guarded Backup
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Dodges the enemy's attack and activates <color=#FFFFFF>Vital View</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Defensive Counter
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after an <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color> to activate:
Attack with a combination of martial arts and shotshells, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Upon activation, gain 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

When another character in your squad is a <color=#FFFFFF>Support</color> character or shares the same Faction:
Zhu Yuan's CRIT Rate is increased by 30% for 10s after using an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>.

1.Name: Quick Reload
1.Desc: When Zhu Yuan activates <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</color>/<color=#FFFFFF>Ultimates</color>, gain the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Reload</color> effect. When Zhu Yuan has the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Reload</color> effect and uses up all <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>, the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Reload</color> effect will be consumed to instantly gain 6/9 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>.
1.Desc2: Zhu Yuan once competed in the Janus Quarter's Public Security Officer Contest, clinching first place with her extraordinary reloading techniques. Her colleague commented: "It's nothing but sheer practice."

2.Name: Ether Ember
2.Desc: In <color=#FFFFFF>Suppressive Mode</color>, Zhu Yuan's Anti-Interrupt level is increased and DMG taken reduced by 10%. When Zhu Yuan hits an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>, deal 10% more <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Please Do Not Resist</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Overwhelming Firepower</color> <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>, stacking up to 5 times and lasting for 5s. Each shot adds one stack of this effect, and repeated triggers reset the duration.
2.Desc2:
Zhu Yuan is equipped with Ether bullets specially designed by Public Security, which cause irreversible corruption upon hitting the enemy.
This is why Zhu Yuan always warns her enemies to surrender and stop resisting before she fires. It really is for their own health and safety...

3.Name: Public Security Special Training
3.Desc2: As an elite Public Security Officer, Zhu Yuan's training focused on a single objective: to enhance all aspects of her combat abilities within the Hollow, ensuring she could outmatch any criminal.

4.Name: Ether Perforation
4.Desc: When Zhu Yuan hits an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>, her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Please Do Not Resist</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Overwhelming Firepower</color> ignore 25% of the target's <color=#FE437E>Ether RES</color>.
4.Desc2: When in battle, the gangs in the Hollows often try to quietly calculate how many bullets their enemies have left. What they don't know is that Zhu Yuan's custom magazine can recharge itself with the Ether in the air...

5.Name: Special Ops Experience
5.Desc2: A seasoned Public Security Officer excels at reading the battlefield, striking precisely and maximizing combat efficiency. Sometimes, one stern look is enough to make her enemies think twice about putting up a fight.

6.Name: Expanded Energy Pack III
6.Desc: When Zhu Yuan consumes a total of 12 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>, she receives the <color=#FFFFFF>Ether Afterglow</color> effect, and the Energy cost of the next <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> is reduced by 30. Launching an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> will consume <color=#FFFFFF>Ether Afterglow</color> and shoot an additional 4-bullet Ether Buckshot. Each extra bullet deals DMG equal to 220% of Zhu Yuan's ATK.
6.Desc2: Zhu Yuan often worries about her gear's remaining battery, getting nervous when the power dips into the red zone and consciously saving power. Public Security finally equipped her with an energy pack that offered both high capacity and long-lasting endurance.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Penultimate
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Launch up to four strikes forward, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
During the 3rd hit, repeatedly press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to continue the attack, continuously striking the enemy. Using <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</color> during this period will not interrupt Qingyi's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> combo count.
During the 3rd hit, stop pressing <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to interrupt the continuous attack, transitioning automatically to the 4th hit. If the continuous attack lasts for a certain time, the 4th hit will be enhanced.
Anti-Interrupt Level is increased and DMG received is reduced by 40% during the 3rd and 4th hit.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Enchanted Blossoms
Description.Desc:
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Launches a forward rush attack, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: Flash Connect
Description.Desc: When Qingyi deals <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> with a skill, she accumulates <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect Voltage</color>. When <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect Voltage</color> reaches 75%, she will enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect</color> state. When using her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, Qingyi will consume all <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect Voltage</color> and exit the <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect</color> state. For every 1% of <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect Voltage</color> consumed over 75%, her Damage and Daze inflicted by this skill will be increased by 1%/0.5%. <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color> itself does not accumulate <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect Voltage</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms
Description.Desc:
During the <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect</color> state, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Launch five consecutive forward rush attacks, then execute a Finishing Move that inflicts massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>. Release <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during the move to trigger the Finishing Move early.
Activate the Finishing Move just before the character is attacked to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased and DMG received is reduced by 40% during the rush attack. Qingyi is invulnerable during the Finishing Move.

Description.Name: Dodge: Swan Song
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Breach
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a Dodge to activate:
Rush forward and then launch an upward attack, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Lingering Sentiments
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Leap into the air and then perform a downward attack, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Sunlit Glory
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Quickly swings upward, followed by a downward smash, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Moonlit Begonia
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Quickly swings upward and leaps into the air, turning around to launch a series of attacks, then follows up with a powerful downward smash, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to consume additional energy to increase the number of hits of the series of attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After executing the move, you can immediately follow up with the 3rd hit of a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Tranquil Serenade
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Launch a series of powerful strikes over a large area in front, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>
When this attack hits an enemy, the skill's DMG increases by 3% for every stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Subjugation</color> in <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Eternal Seasons</color> the target has.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Eight Sounds of Ganzhou
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Launch a series of powerful strikes over a large area in front, followed by a Finishing Move, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Wind Through the Pines
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Leap into the air and perform a downward attack, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Graceful Embellishment
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color> when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Song of the Clear River
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Rush forward with an attack and inject electrical energy into the ground, then pull back to trigger an explosion, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Wind Through the Pines
Assist Follow-Up: Song of the Clear River

1251010.Name: Quick Assist: Wind Through the Pines

1251012.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Song of the Clear River

Name: Core Passive: Eternal Seasons
Additional Ability: Three Verses of Farewell at Yang Pass
Desc: When Qingyi lands a Finishing Move on an enemy with her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, it applies 5 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Subjugation</color> to the enemy, stacking up to 20 times. Each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Subjugation</color> increases the target's Stun DMG Multiplier by <color=#2BAD00>2</color>%. For each rush attack performed during <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, the Finishing Move will apply 1 extra stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Subjugation</color>. If <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> is triggered when using the Finishing Move, it directly applies {CAL:5+5,1,2} stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Subjugation</color>. When applying Subjugation to normal and elite enemies, the target receives double the stacks. When the target recovers from being Stunned, the corresponding stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Subjugation</color> are reset.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color> character or shares the same Faction:
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color> deal 20% increased Daze. If Qingyi's Impact is greater than 120, each point over increases her ATK by 6, up to a maximum of 600.

1.Name: Insulation Breakdown
1.Desc: When Qingyi enters combat, <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect Voltage</color> is instantly restored to its maximum, and the accumulation rate is increased by 30%. When using her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, if <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect Voltage</color> is at its maximum, the attack will reduce the DEF of the enemy it hits by 15%, and Qingyi's CRIT Rate against that enemy will increase by 20% for 15s.
1.Desc2:
"While there will be no threat to your life, we kindly request you do not resist arrest..."
The direction and intensity of the current have been precisely calculated to ensure that every suspect receives a safe electric shock experience.

2.Name: Minimal Effort, Maximum Impact
2.Desc: The Stun DMG Multiplier increase provided by each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Subjugation</color> in <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Eternal Seasons</color> increases to 135% of its original value. When Qingyi's attack hits an enemy and the stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Subjugation</color> she applies reaches its maximum stacks, her Daze dealt to the target increases by 15%.
2.Desc2:
An ancient combat technique mentioned in old civillization texts. It seems to have started as a martial arts technique, rather than a staff technique.
"Don't be so constrained, the arm itself can be used like a three-section staff, mhm."

3.Name: Drink Hot Water
3.Desc2:
"Young people should be mindful their health, and drinking more hot water is a good start."
Qingyi always appears comforted when she drinks from her flask. But be careful if she offers you a drink—
"Even 100-degree Celsius boiling water doesn't faze her..." One Public Security Officer who encountered this left such a note.

4.Name: Stable Arc Barrier
4.Desc: Upon entering or exiting <color=#FFFFFF>Flash Connect</color> state, gain a shield equal to 10% of Qingyi's Max HP. If a previous shield is still active when the shield effect refreshes, Qingyi generates 5 Energy. This Energy Generation effect can be triggered once every 10s.
4.Desc2:
By reverse-engineering Automatons from the old civilization, the White Star Institute developed the Arc Barrier, a technology that combines defense, attack, and electrical energy conversion.
"As the saying goes: Water can float a boat or sink it. Physics has a saying: Electric current flows like water. Therefore: Electric current can be used both offensively and defensively. It's a fantastic combination."

5.Name: Youthful Spirit
5.Desc2:
"Great, young people should be courageous and try new things. Keep it up!"
It sometimes feels like Qingyi's encouragement is lazy and teasing, but if you really get into trouble, just rely on her.
After all, she's been around for centuries and can handle anything.

6.Name: Eight Meridians
6.Desc: The Interrupt Level of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color> is greatly increased, and the CRIT DMG is increased by an additional 100%. When Qingyi hits an enemy with her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, the target's Attribute DMG RES is reduced by 20% for 15s.
6.Desc2:
A theory about the human circulatory system documented in ancient texts from the old civilization. It's said those who fully master this theory can instantly disable an opponent in a fight.
"How about trying the pressure points that cause itching next time? Who should be the guinea pig? Manager? Or Zhu Yuan?"

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Dancing Blades
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 6 attacks in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Passion
Description.Desc:
When Jane triggers <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or performs a move that deals DMG to the enemy, she accumulates <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>. Upon reaching the maximum <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>, Jane enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, Jane's <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate</color> is increased by 25%. Additionally, if Jane's Anomaly Proficiency exceeds 120, each extra point raises her ATK by 2, up to a maximum of 600.
In the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, Jane's skills that deal damage consume <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>. Activating a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> regenerates <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>. Jane exits the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state when all of her <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color> is consumed.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Salchow Jump
Description.Desc:
Entering the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state grants Jane one use of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Salchow Jump</color>.
When available, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Launch rapid consecutive attacks forward, followed by a Finishing Move, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Hold the button during the consecutive attacks to extend the skill duration. Release <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to trigger the Finishing Move early.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased during the consecutive attacks, and Jane takes 40% reduced DMG. Jane is invulnerable during the Finishing Move.
Using and damaging an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Salchow Jump</color> while in the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state generates <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: Phantom
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to trigger.
A quick slide dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
Jane has an extra dodge. Before she enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, she alternates between the two dodges. After entering the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, Jane can pass through enemies in front when dodging.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Edge Jump
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
If after the first dodge, launch an upward slash in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
If after the second dodge, perform a consecutive slashes in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Phantom Thrust
Description.Desc:
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Launch three quick rushing slashes in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Swift Shadow
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
If after the first dodge, unleash multiple slashes at enemies in front, followed by a downward thrust, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
If after the second dodge, leap up and deliver three consecutive attacks to enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Swift Shadow Dance
Description.Desc:
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Slash enemies in front quickly multiple times, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Aerial Sweep
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Leaps into the air to launch consecutive kicks forward, then sweeps across, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Aerial Sweep - Clearout
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Leaps into the air to launch multiple consecutive kicks forward, then sweeps across, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Aerial Sweep - Clearout
Chain Attack: Flowers of Sin
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Weaves between and slashes enemies in a large area in front, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Jane directly enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state upon activating the skill, and gains max <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Final Curtain
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Weaves between and slashes enemies with a powerful attack in a large area in front, followed by a Finishing Move, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Jane directly enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state upon activating the skill, and gains max <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Dark Thorn
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Unleash multiple slashes at enemies in front, followed by a downward thrust, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Lutz Jump
Description.Desc:
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, when the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Slash enemies in front quickly multiple times, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Last Defense
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Gale Sweep
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Leap up and swiftly slash the enemy, then execute a wide sweeping slash across a large area in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1261004.Name: EX Special Attack: Aerial Sweep - Clearout

Name: Core Passive: Insight
Additional Ability: Sore Spot
Desc: When Jane's attacks hit an enemy, it causes them to enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</color> state, lasting for 10s. If any squad member triggers <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> on an enemy in the <color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</color> state and causes the <color=#F0D12B>Flinch</color> effect, the <color=#F0D12B>Flinch</color> effect duration is extended by 5s, and <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> DMG has a chance to trigger a critical hit, with a base CRIT Rate of <color=#2BAD00>20%</color> and CRIT DMG of 50%. Each point of Jane's Anomaly Proficiency further increases this CRIT Rate by <color=#2BAD00>0.1%</color>.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character or shares the same Faction:
Jane's <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate</color> is increased by 20%. When the enemy is already suffering from an Attribute Anomaly, Jane's <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup</color> towards the target is increased by an additional 15%.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character or shares the same Faction:

1.Name: Crime Counsel
1.Desc: The maximum uses of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Salchow Jump</color> are increased by one. While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, Jane's <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate</color> increases by an extra 15% and each point of Jane's Anomaly Proficiency increases her DMG by 0.1%, up to a maximum increase of 30%.
1.Desc2:
"A criminal consultant advises on criminology, not on how to actually commit crimes."
Jane suddenly leaned closer and blinked.
"Of course, if you see it as the latter... I won't mind."

2.Name: Adapt to the Environment
2.Desc: When Jane's attack hits an enemy in the <color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</color> state, or when any squad member triggers <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> on an enemy in the <color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</color> state, 15% of the enemy's DEF is ignored. Additionally, when <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> DMG triggers a critical hit, the CRIT DMG dealt is increased by an additional 50%.
2.Desc2:
Gaze into the abyss, and it gazes back. That's only the first step.
"Then you must approach, enter, and understand it. This is the second step."
"The final step... is to resist becoming it."

3.Name: Anonymity
3.Desc2:
"Anonymity — that means to become anyone. Your favorite person, perhaps~"
"Or maybe, your worst fear?"

4.Name: Adapt and Thrive
4.Desc: When any squad member triggers the <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> effects, all squad members' Attribute Anomaly DMG is increased by 18%, lasting 15s.
4.Desc2:
"Whether you're a hunter or the hunted usually depends on your perspective. However, I favor a more straightforward assessment—"
"The Loser is the prey."

5.Name: Compulsive Hoarder
5.Desc2:
Jane's room is filled with all sorts of things, especially fast food.
"Isn't it nice here? There's food within reach everywhere~"

6.Name: "Shady" Technique
6.Desc: While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, Jane's CRIT Rate increases by 20%, and CRIT DMG by 40%. After any squad member inflicts <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color>, Jane instantly enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, and gains max <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>. When <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> triggers a critical hit, Jane performs an additional attack on the target, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> equal to 1,600% of her Anomaly Proficiency.
6.Desc2:
On the streets, the means don't matter, only the outcome.
"Seeing the darkest desires reveals the most crucial weaknesses."

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Lightning Strike
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 attacks in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Lightning Strike - Electrified
Description.Desc:
When <color=#FFFFFF>Resolve</color> is above or equal to 75%, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate.
Consume 75% <color=#FFFFFF>Resolve</color> to launch consecutive attacks in front, followed by a Finishing Move, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the Finishing Move hits an enemy, it triggers the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> of the squad member positioned before Seth.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dodge: Evasion Maneuver
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Thunder Assault
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a Dodge to activate:
Charge forward with a shield attack, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Damage received during the move is decreased by 40%.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Retreat to Advance
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Unleash a quick downward slash on enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
After the move, hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to chain into <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</color>, enabling faster charging.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Launch two shield attacks forward, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Unleash a series of slashes in front, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady>to charge the move, and Seth will dash forward, unleashing a series of powerful slashes, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Activating the move accumulates 75% <color=#FFFFFF>Resolve</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while charging this skill, and damage taken is reduced by 40%.
Seth is invulnerable during the consecutive slashes.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage
Chain Attack: Final Judgement
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Launch a series of slashes in front, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Activating the move accumulates 75% <color=#FFFFFF>Resolve</color>.
After the move, hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to chain into <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</color>, enabling faster charging.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Justice Prevails
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Launch a series of upward attacks in front, followed by a Finishing Move, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Activating the move accumulates 75% <color=#FFFFFF>Resolve</color>, and grants 3 additional Assist Points.
After the move, hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to chain into <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</color>, enabling faster charging.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Armed Support
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Unleash a quick downward slash on enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
After the move, hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to chain into <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</color>, enabling faster charging.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Thundershield
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Upon activation, gain 25% <color=#FFFFFF>Resolve</color>.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color> when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Public Security Ruling
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Launch a forward thrust attack, followed by two horizontal slashes, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the skill hits an enemy, it triggers the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> of the squad member positioned before Seth.
After activating the move, hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to transition to <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</color> and charge faster.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1271004.Name: EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage

Name: Core Passive: Protector
Additional Ability: High Spirit
Desc: When Seth uses <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thunder Shield Rush - High Voltage</color>, he gains a <color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</color> equal to <color=#2BAD00>40%</color> of his initial ATK, up to a max of 3,000 points, and lasting 25s. This effect can trigger once every 10s. When <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Lightning Strike - Electrified</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Public Security Ruling</color> triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, causing another squad member to enter the field, that squad member gains a <color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</color> equal to <color=#2BAD00>40</color>% of Seth's initial ATK, up to a max of 3,000 points, and lasting 25s. This effect can trigger once every 10s. Having a <color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</color> increases Anomaly Proficiency by <color=#2BAD00>50</color>.

This effect can trigger once every 10s. Having a <color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</color> increases Anomaly Proficiency by <color=#2BAD00>100</color>.

When Seth's <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack: Final Judgement</color> or Finishing Move during <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Lightning Strike - Electrified</color> hits an enemy, the target's Anomaly Buildup RES to all Attributes is reduced by 20%, lasting 20s.

1.Name: Heroism
1.Desc: The shield value provided by <color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</color> and its maximum limit is increased by 30%. When <color=#FFFFFF>Shield of Firm Resolve</color> ends, the Anomaly Proficiency increase provided by <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Protector</color> lasts an additional 10s.
1.Desc2:
When it comes to team missions, Seth is always leading the charge.
"Let me handle the arrests! I scored a 99 in close-quarters arrests, and the only point deducted was because I accidentally sprained the instructor's wrist."

2.Name: Recklessness of Youth
2.Desc: Upon entering battle, Seth immediately gains 75% <color=#FFFFFF>Resolve</color>. Hitting an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Lightning Strike - Electrified</color> increases the move's accumulated <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color> by 35%.
2.Desc2:
Many criminals make the mistake of underestimating Seth.
It might be his pure, clear eyes or those innocent-looking furry ears and tail. Whatever the reason, everyone who underestimates him eventually pays the price.

3.Name: Slow Reflexes
3.Desc2:
"A skilled officer like you must handle everything on your own, right? No help from others, surely?"
Even after hearing this, Seth remained composed and didn't say a word.
It wasn't until midnight that he suddenly woke up: "Could that guy's comment earlier... have been a dig at me?"

4.Name: Core Aspiration
4.Desc: The Daze caused by <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist: Thundershield</color> is increased by 25%.
4.Desc2:
"Put aside your foolish notions of good and evil. You can't protect everyone. Sometimes, you have to make a choice."
"This is my choice, and it's the core responsibility of an officer — you're the one who has changed, Brother."

5.Name: Distant Admiration
5.Desc2:
Seth used to deeply admire and respect his older brother. But as you know, "admiration" is the furthest thing from "understanding."
"Someday, I'll become the finest officer... and make him eat his words!"

6.Name: Idealist
6.Desc: When Seth lands a Finishing Move on an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Lightning Strike - Electrified</color>, it deals additional damage equal to 500% of his ATK. The attack is guaranteed to trigger a critical hit, and CRIT DMG is increased by 60%.
6.Desc2:
To a young person, everything is clear-cut, with a stark contrast between black and white, right and wrong.
There will always be someone who tries to tell him that the world is a murky gray. But is a world where everything is clear-cut and distinct really not worth striving for?

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Load Up and Roll Out
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 slashes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Load Up and Roll Out
Dodge: Handbrake Drift
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Pedal to the Metal
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Power Drift
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Unleash a downward smash attack in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Pedal to the Metal
Special Attack: Tire Spin
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Piper spins and launches a sweeping slash around her, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Special> to extend the skill duration, unleashing increasingly powerful spinning slashes and increasing the charge level of the skill up to 2 times.
If the skill is used after the first 3 hits of a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, you can quickly activate <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</color> of an increased charge level.
During the skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

Description.Name: Special Attack: One Trillion Tons
Description.Desc:
While <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</color> is active, release <IconMap:Icon_Special> to trigger a downward smash attack based on the charge level of <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</color>, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Engine Spin
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, continue holding <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> after <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</color> reaches maximum charge level to activate:
Rapidly spins, unleashing powerful spinning slashes around her and dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
This skill consumes Energy continuously for up to 3s.
During the skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Really Heavy
Description.Desc:
During <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</color>, release <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Piper unleashes a downward smash attack, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
If the duration of <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</color> reaches its limit or Energy drops to 20, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Really Heavy</color> will automatically activate.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Buckle Up
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful downward smash at enemies ahead in a large area, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Hold~ On~ Tight~
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Rapidly spins, unleashing powerful spinning slashes at enemies in a large area ahead, followed by a downward smash, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Brake Tap
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Launches a downward smash attack at enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Emergency Brake
Description.Desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color> when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Overtaking Maneuver
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Charge and slash enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Name: Core Passive: Power Charge
Additional Ability: Synced Acceleration
Desc: When Piper's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> hits an enemy, she gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color>, up to a maximum of 20 stacks, lasting for 12s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. For every stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color>, Piper's <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>2%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Piper has 20 or more stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color>, all squad members' DMG is increased by 18%.
