1.Name: Leisure Moment
1.Desc: When Piper's <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> hits an enemy with a spinning slash, there is a 50% chance to gain an additional stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color>. The maximum stack limit of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color> is increased to 30.
1.Desc2:
One ordinary morning at Sons of Calydon, Piper lets out a lazy yawn.
"Good morning—"
"Can we have another relaxing day today? It's important to take it easy, or else lil ol' me might end up working meself to death—"

2.Name: Motivation
2.Desc: During <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</color>, Piper's movement speed increases. When using <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: One Trillion Tons</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Really Heavy</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> to launch a downward smash that hits an enemy, the <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> dealt by the move is increased by 10%. For each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color>, this buff is further increased by 1%.
2.Desc2:
A bit of effort now means more rest later.
Though, it'd be even better if I didn't have to put in any effort at all — Piper stretches, pats the soft bed in her truck, and lies down.

3.Name: Truck Expert
3.Desc2:
Piper is always all about trucks.
Even when she's fast asleep, the rumble of an engine snaps her awake in an instant:
"100 horsepower, 5-ton capacity... must be the new light truck from Three Gates Industries!"

4.Name: Refined Techniques
4.Desc: Whenever a squad member inflicts an Attribute Anomaly on an enemy, Piper recovers 20 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 30s.
4.Desc2:
Riding with Piper is a heart-pounding experience.
By the time she drawls out, "Hold~ on~ tight~," the truck is already barreling down the road.
She always gets you to your destination fast—though your nerves might take a hit.

5.Name: Personal Hobbies
5.Desc2:
Piper seems to have some hobbies that are not what you'd expect from her.
"This horse looks like a real runner... Hmm, but not many people are betting on it. Guess the one with the higher win rate is the safer bet..."
"Burp— Nitro-Fuel... I can drink more... Gimme another one!"

6.Name: Mild Excitement
6.Desc: Increases the duration limit of <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</color> by 2s and extends the duration of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color> by 4s.
6.Desc2:
As you may already know, Piper's biggest dream is to live a life of perpetual relaxation.
But right now, her usually half-closed eyes are surprisingly bright and alert.
"If it's for you... I suppose lil ol' me can try a little harder~"

Description.Name: Basic Attack: "Capriccio"
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Perform up to three attacks forward, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
During the 3rd hit, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to charge, drawing enemies in and expanding the attack range for a stronger attack.
After using other skills, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to initiate the 3rd hit directly.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Interlude
Description.Desc:
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Release <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> forward to attack, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> will be triggered when this skill hits an enemy.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Chorus
Description.Desc:
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Launch multiple <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> attacks at enemies in front, dealing massive <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> will be triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Finale
Description.Desc:
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Release <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> forward to attack, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> and exit the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state.
Upon activation of the skill, it grants Astra Yao the buff from <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: "Graceful Andante"</color>.
With enough Energy, consumes Energy to follow up with 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> and 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Tone Clusters</color>. This <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> attack released is considered an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: "Mini Waltz"
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: "Lunar Eclipse Melody"
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Attack ahead, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
When triggered, dragging the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} allows movement in the corresponding direction.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: "Umbrella Waltz"
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Attack enemies in front, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: "Windchimes & Oaths"
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Quickly move away, then release <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color>, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>, and enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state.
During activation, dragging the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} enables movement in the direction held.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Special> to charge during activation, drawing enemies in, and follow up with 1 to 4 <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolos</color> depending on the charge duration.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> will be triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
Character is invulnerable when quickly moving away.

Description.Name: Idyllic Cadenza
Description.Desc:
After entering the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, Astra Yao increases all squad members' DMG by <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:0.08+AvatarSkillLevel(1)*0.01,100,2}%</color> and CRIT DMG by <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:0.07+AvatarSkillLevel(1)*0.015,100,2}%</color>.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, Astra Yao cannot move, but pressing <IconMap:Icon_Normal> will activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Interlude</color>, and pressing <IconMap:Icon_Evade> will activate a dodge. After triggering a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Chorus</color>.
While in this state, Astra Yao's Anti-Interrupt Level is increased, and the DMG she takes is reduced by 40%. After switching to another character, Astra Yao will remain on the field and become Invulnerable. When switching back to her, she will automatically follow up with <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: "Windchimes & Oaths"</color>.
During this state, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Finale</color>, exiting the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, or hold <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to exit the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state directly.

Description.Name: Chord
Description.Desc:
For every 25 Energy, Astra Yao will have 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Chord</color>.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, when Astra Yao has <color=#FFFFFF>Chords</color>, a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> can be triggered in the following situations:
· When the active character's attack hits an enemy, once per 3s.
· When the active character's heavy attack hits an enemy, once per 1s.
When other squad members switch in through a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color>, Astra Yao will consume 25 Energy and release 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> to attack. This <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> attack released is considered an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>.
After triggering a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, quickly press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to switch characters and trigger a <color=#FFFFFF>Precise Assist</color>, causing Astra Yao to follow up with 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Tone Clusters</color> to attack. When other squad members switch in through a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color>, it will automatically trigger a <color=#FFFFFF>Precise Assist</color>.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: "Tipsy Concerto"
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Use song to channel energy into a blast, dealing massive <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
A <color=#ffffff>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
After the skill, Astra Yao enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state.

Description.Name: Ultimate: "Fantasian Sonata"
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Use song to channel energy into a blast, dealing massive <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>, and restoring <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:-50+AvatarSkillLevel(3)*250,1,2}</color> HP to all squad members.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
A <color=#ffffff>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
After the skill, Astra Yao enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state.
After the skill, the next two <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assists</color> will be replaced by <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</color>.
Before all replacement chances are used up, a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is triggered whenever any squad member hits an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: "One Luminous Sky"
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Attack enemies in front, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Evasive Assist: "Two Hearts"
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Dodges the enemy's attack and activates <color=#FFFFFF>Vital View</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: "Three Lifetimes of Fate"
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after an <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color> to activate:
Release an energy beam forward, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Name: Core Passive: "Graceful Andante"
Additional Ability: "Moonlit Frenzy"
Desc: During the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, when other squad members switch in through a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color>, and if Astra Yao expends Energy to release <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> to attack, both Astra Yao and the incoming character's ATK are increased. The increase is equal to <color=#2BAD00>22%</color> of Astra Yao's initial ATK, up to a maximum of 1,200. The effect lasts for 20s and can be extended up to 30s with repeated triggers.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character:
When Energy is consumed to trigger a <color=#FFFFFF>Precise Assist</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Finale</color>, Astra Yao will additionally follow up with 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> and 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Tone Clusters</color>.

Name: Core Passive: "Graceful Andante"
Additional Ability: "Moonlit Frenzy"
Desc: During the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, when other squad members switch in through a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color>, and when Astra Yao expends Energy to release <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> to attack, both Astra Yao and the incoming character's ATK are increased. The increase is equal to <color=#2BAD00>24%</color> of Astra Yao's initial ATK, up to a maximum of 1,200. The effect lasts for 20s and can be extended up to 30s with repeated triggers.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character:
When Energy is consumed to trigger a <color=#FFFFFF>Precise Assist</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Finale</color>, Astra Yao will additionally follow up with 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> and 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Tone Clusters</color>.

Name: Core Passive: "Graceful Andante"
Additional Ability: "Moonlit Frenzy"
Desc: During the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, when other squad members switch in through a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color>, and when Astra Yao expends Energy to release <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> to attack, both Astra Yao and the incoming character's ATK are increased. The increase is equal to <color=#2BAD00>26%</color> of Astra Yao's initial ATK, up to a maximum of 1,200. The effect lasts for 20s and can be extended up to 30s with repeated triggers.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character:
When Energy is consumed to trigger a <color=#FFFFFF>Precise Assist</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Finale</color>, Astra Yao will additionally follow up with 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> and 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Tone Clusters</color>.

Name: Core Passive: "Graceful Andante"
Additional Ability: "Moonlit Frenzy"
Desc: During the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, when other squad members switch in through a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color>, and when Astra Yao expends Energy to release <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> to attack, both Astra Yao and the incoming character's ATK are increased. The increase is equal to <color=#2BAD00>28%</color> of Astra Yao's initial ATK, up to a maximum of 1,200. The effect lasts for 20s and can be extended up to 30s with repeated triggers.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character:
When Energy is consumed to trigger a <color=#FFFFFF>Precise Assist</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Finale</color>, Astra Yao will additionally follow up with 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> and 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Tone Clusters</color>.

Name: Core Passive: "Graceful Andante"
Additional Ability: "Moonlit Frenzy"
Desc: During the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, when other squad members switch in through a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color>, and when Astra Yao expends Energy to release <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> to attack, both Astra Yao and the incoming character's ATK are increased. The increase is equal to <color=#2BAD00>30%</color> of Astra Yao's initial ATK, up to a maximum of 1,200. The effect lasts for 20s and can be extended up to 30s with repeated triggers.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character:
When Energy is consumed to trigger a <color=#FFFFFF>Precise Assist</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Finale</color>, Astra Yao will additionally follow up with 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> and 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Tone Clusters</color>.

Name: Core Passive: "Graceful Andante"
Additional Ability: "Moonlit Frenzy"
Desc: During the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, when other squad members switch in through a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color>, and when Astra Yao expends Energy to release <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> to attack, both Astra Yao and the incoming character's ATK are increased. The increase is equal to <color=#2BAD00>32%</color> of Astra Yao's initial ATK, up to a maximum of 1,200. The effect lasts for 20s and can be extended up to 30s with repeated triggers.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character:
When Energy is consumed to trigger a <color=#FFFFFF>Precise Assist</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Finale</color>, Astra Yao will additionally follow up with 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> and 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Tone Clusters</color>.

Name: Core Passive: "Graceful Andante"
Additional Ability: "Moonlit Frenzy"
Desc: During the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, when other squad members switch in through a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color>, and when Astra Yao expends Energy to release <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> to attack, both Astra Yao and the incoming character's ATK are increased. The increase is equal to <color=#2BAD00>35%</color> of Astra Yao's initial ATK, up to a maximum of 1,200. The effect lasts for 20s and can be extended up to 30s with repeated triggers.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character:
When Energy is consumed to trigger a <color=#FFFFFF>Precise Assist</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Finale</color>, Astra Yao will additionally follow up with 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> and 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Tone Clusters</color>.

1.Name: 12-Tone Equal Temperament
1.Desc: When Astra Yao's attack hits an enemy, the target's All-Attribute RES is reduced by 6%, stacking up to 3 times and lasting 30s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Upon entering the battlefield, Astra Yao immediately gains 1,000 Decibels. When activating her <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, all squad members gain 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Song of Protection</color> for 60s. When attacked by an enemy, consume <color=#FFFFFF>Song of Protection</color>, granting Invulnerability for 1s.
1.Desc2:
"What is the 12-tone equal temperament?"
"12-tone equal temperament is a musical tuning system, just like how children have to line up, sounds need to be in order too."
"But sounds probably don't like lining up, just like children!"
—Astra Yao's music teacher, recalling when she was six.

2.Name: Art of Greed
2.Desc: The ATK buff from <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: "Graceful Andante"</color> is further increased by 19%, with an increased maximum of 400. While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, when other squad members switch in through a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color>, Astra Yao will additionally follow up with 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> and 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Tone Clusters</color> to attack. This effect can trigger once every 3s.
2.Desc2:
"The shiniest thing in the world is, of course, love!"
Just like a bird gathering shiny things for its nest, an artist's inner greed is probably to gather all the love in the world. By gathering all the love, one can create the most beautiful melody.

3.Name: Interwoven Staff Notation
3.Desc2:
A blank musical staff is a set of parallel lines that never intersect, like souls that have never met, quietly waiting for their melodies to intertwine into a song.
"Let's fill it with notes! And lots and lots of tied notes. It'll make a fantastic song!"
And that's how a new song was created, stretching across 136 bars, all connected with ties...

4.Name: "Hair Upon Your Nape"
4.Desc: After activating a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, within 15s, Astra Yao can trigger a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> even if she does not have <color=#FFFFFF>Chords</color>. When the attack hits an enemy, the interval for triggering a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is reduced to 1s. While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, when other squad members enter the field via a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, they will receive different buffs based on their specialty, and this effect can be triggered once every 3s for the entire squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color>: The next <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> heavy attack on an enemy will deal extra DMG equal to 300% of Astra Yao's ATK; <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color>: The next <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> will have 50% increased Anomaly Buildup; <color=#FFFFFF>Stun</color>: The next <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> will inflict 50% increased Daze.
4.Desc2:
One hand hovers over the piano
Not sure which note will bring me peace
A sad minor key
Or gentle melody of longing?
I seek your shadow through the score
I close my eyes, and see you more
Such as the hair upon your nape

5.Name: Proxy and Silk String
5.Desc2:
"Eve! I've just realized something huge — both you and {M#Wise}{F#Belle} are tall and slim!"
"...And your point being...?"
"You're both my favorite people!"
Astra beamed with joy, as if she had uncovered an earth-shattering secret.

6.Name: We Are the World
6.Desc: While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Idyllic Cadenza</color> state, the DMG multiplier for <color=#FFFFFF>Tremolo</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Tone Clusters</color> released or followed up with will increase to 200% of the original, and CRIT Rate is increased by 80%. When triggering a <color=#FFFFFF>Precise Assist</color>, Astra Yao will automatically follow up with the charged 3rd-hit of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: "Capriccio"</color>, with a 80% increased CRIT Rate. This effect can trigger once every 10s.
6.Desc2:
The turmoil in the world originates from the solitude of the human heart. If everyone's heart was reciprocated, perhaps all the suffering, sadness, and silence in the world would vanish?
If we could weave this connection with song, would all the cracks heal, and all the pain turn into a beautiful melody, filling the silence? At that point, the world would no longer be a lonely island.
"This song is dedicated to the world!"

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Razor Wire
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Launch up to five attacks ahead, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
When the 5th hit lands against an enemy, Evelyn will use her <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to bind the primary target and enter <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>.

Description.Name: Passive: Bind
Description.Desc:
When Evelyn uses her skills to deal DMG to enemies, she will accumulate <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Embers</color>.
When Evelyn consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Embers</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Garrote</color> or consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Decibels</color> to perform an <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, she gains 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Tether Point</color>.
Once Evelyn has 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Tether Points</color>, her next use of <color=#FFFFFF>Garrote</color> will consume all <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Tether Points</color> to instead use a lower Interrupt Level version of <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack: Lunalux - Snare</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Garrote - First Form
Description.Desc:
When <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Embers</color> is at 50% or higher, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> or <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Consume 50% <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Embers</color> to use <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to perform a slashing attack, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
During skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.
After using this skill, gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Tether Point</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Garrote - Second Form
Description.Desc:
When <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Embers</color> is 50% or higher, after using <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Garrote - First Form</color>, continue to hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> or <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Consume 50% <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Embers</color> to use <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to perform a follow-up attack, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
During skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.
After using this skill, gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Tether Point</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: Arc Step
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Piercing Ambush
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Deliver a kick to the enemy in front, causing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Strangling Reversal
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Use <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to slash surrounding enemies, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>;
When the attack hits an enemy, Evelyn will use <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to bind the primary target and enter <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Locked Position
Description.Desc:
Before entering <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_Special> or <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Use <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to pull the enemy and charge forward with a kick, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
When the attack hits the enemy, Evelyn will use <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to bind the primary target and enter <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Binding Sunder - First Form
Description.Desc:
After entering <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>, press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Centered on the target affected by <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>, tether surrounding enemies and detonate an explosion, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color> will end after detonation.
Dodge enemy attacks upon activating the skill, and if a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> is triggered, gain an additional 25% <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Embers</color>.
After tethering surrounding enemies, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to cancel detonation and immediately follow up with the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack's</color> 3rd hit.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Binding Sunder - Final Form
Description.Desc:
After entering <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color> and with enough Energy, press or hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Centered on the target affected by <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>, tether surrounding enemies and detonate an explosion, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color> will end after detonation.
Dodge enemy attacks upon activating the skill, and if a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> is triggered, gain an additional 25% <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Embers</color>.
After pulling in surrounding enemies, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to cancel detonation and immediately follow up with the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack's</color> 3rd hit.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Binding Sunder - First Form
EX Special Attack: Binding Sunder - Final Form
Chain Attack: Lunalux - Snare
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Evelyn slashes in front with multiple <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrotes</color> and detonates an explosion, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> to enemies in the area.
When the attack hits an enemy, Evelyn uses <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to bind the primary target and enters <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Lunalux Garrote - Timbre
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Evelyn slashes in front with multiple <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrotes</color> and detonates an explosion, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> to enemies in the area.
Upon activating this skill, Evelyn removes her jacket and enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Dance of Awakened Fire</color> state, which lasts for the entire battle. While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Dance of Awakened Fire</color> state, when Evelyn consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Tether Points</color> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack: Lunalux - Snare</color>, she will retain 1 point of <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Tether Point</color>. When the attack hits an enemy, Evelyn uses <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to bind the primary target, entering <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Tether Point</color>.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Lunalux Garrote - Shadow
Description.Desc:
While under the <color=#FFFFFF>Dance of Awakened Fire</color> state, and when Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Evelyn slashes in front with multiple <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrotes</color> and detonates an explosion, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> to enemies in the area.
When the attack hits an enemy, Evelyn uses <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to bind the primary target and enters <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Tether Point</color>.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Fierce Blade
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Use <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to slash surrounding enemies, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
When the attack hits an enemy, Evelyn will use <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to bind the primary target and enter <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Silent Protection
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Course Disruption
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Evelyn slashes with <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color>, then triggers an explosion ahead, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
When the attack hits an enemy, Evelyn will use <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> to bind the primary target and enter <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

If Evelyn switches to another character while in <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color>, she will automatically follow up with <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Binding Sunder - First Form</color>.

When another character in your squad is a <color=#FFFFFF>Stun</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Support</color> character:
Evelyn's <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> DMG increases by 30%. When Evelyn's CRIT Rate is at or over 80%, the DMG multiplier for her <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> increases to 125% of the original value.

1.Name: Dreamweave
1.Desc: Upon entering the battlefield, Evelyn immediately gains 1,500 Decibels. Enemies affected by <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Seal</color> will be <color=#FFFFFF>Bound</color>. When Evelyn attacks <color=#FFFFFF>Bound</color> enemies, she ignores 12% of their DEF. When Evelyn uses <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Binding Sunder - First Form</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Binding Sunder - Final Form</color>, the <color=#FFFFFF>Bound</color> effect spreads to all enemies hit by the skill. This spread <color=#FFFFFF>Bound</color> effect lasts for 10s.
1.Desc2:
The distant, blurred light seemed to be a dream she had crafted, an unreachable future. It wasn't about atonement, but a yearning for freedom.
"You want it too, don't you? A real life." An anonymous former coworker once asked Evelyn.

2.Name: Dance of Fire
2.Desc: Evelyn's ATK increases by 15%. When Evelyn uses <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Garrote - First Form</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Garrote - Second Form</color>, the <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Embers</color> consumed will be returned. This effect can trigger once every 25s. When Evelyn consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Burning Tether Point</color> to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack: Lunalux - Snare</color>, the skill's Interrupt Level increases.
2.Desc2:
"To me, that light was unfamiliar, something I should have steered clear of, but it broke through every barrier, as though it was trying to remind me that beyond the darkness, there was something worth chasing."
When Evelyn recalls the first time she met Astra Yao, there's a rare softness in her tone.

3.Name: Metamorphosis
3.Desc2: At that moment, she frees herself from her restraints and becomes her truest self. The tightened ropes snap, and the chains turn into a broken cocoon. Evelyn stands at the boundary of rebirth, and in her cold, sharp gaze, there is the flicker of a faint, soft glow.

4.Name: Fate's Melody
4.Desc: Upon activating a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, Evelyn immediately gains a shield equal to 10% of her Max HP. While this shield exists, Evelyn's CRIT DMG increases by 40%.
4.Desc2:
"You know, Eve? Every time I meet someone important to me, my heart goes 'thump-thump!'"
Evelyn sighs, signaling that it was getting late. Astra quickly fastens the back of her gown and rushed out the door.
"Thump thump," Evelyn mutters to herself, left alone in the dressing room.

5.Name: Crimson Threads Like the Dawn
5.Desc2:
Her threads, dyed crimson like the clouds at dawn.
After each attack, she spins elegantly, blazing flames scattering like the morning light. No words are needed — Evelyn's protection has turned into a radiant flame.

6.Name: Bond of Light and Shadow
6.Desc: Upon launching a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, Evelyn gains <color=#FFFFFF>Shadowstring Edge</color> for 20s. During <color=#FFFFFF>Shadowstring Edge</color>, when Evelyn hits her primary target with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, she additionally executes a <color=#FFFFFF>Lunalux Garrote</color> follow-up attack, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> equal to 375% of her ATK to enemies in the area. This DMG is considered <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> DMG and can trigger up to 16 times. Gaining another <color=#FFFFFF>Shadowstring Edge</color> will refresh the trigger count.
6.Desc2:
Where there is light, there will always be shadow.
It silently hides, tracing the light's path, guarding each bright burst. The shadow never tries to steal the light's brilliance, but at every turn, it quietly fills those corners the light cannot reach. The two have never been separated, nor can they be — light is whole because of shadow, and shadow exists because of light. It's an eternal pursuit, an unspeakable connection.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Swift Strike
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 3 attacks forward, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Leaping Strike
Description.Desc:
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Leap forward and unleash a series of slashes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: Reversal Shot
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: First Strike Advantage
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Dash forward and slash, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Relentless Retribution
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Thrust at enemies in front, then follow up with a swift slash, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Rending Claw
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Perform a rapid back-and-forth piercing attack, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Rending Claw - Nightmare Shadow
Description.Desc:
While Pulchra is in the <color=#FFFFFF>Hunter's Gait</color> state, and when another active character in the squad hits an enemy with a heavy attack from a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>:
Dash back-and-forth piercing enemies surrounding the target, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
After using this skill, if another active character in the squad hits an enemy, Pulchra will repeat the attack up to 5 additional times, with the final attack being a more powerful Finishing Move.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
<color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Rending Claw - Nightmare Shadow</color> is an <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> attack.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Rending Claw - Flashstep
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Pierce back and forth times, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Rending Claw - Nightmare Shadow
EX Special Attack: Rending Claw - Flashstep
Chain Attack: Hey, Didn't Expect That, Right?
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a charged shot forward, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Oh, Time to Play?

Unleash a powerful shot at enemies in a large area ahead, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Independent Pricing

Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after an <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color> to activate:
Leap forward into the air and fire, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Name: Core Passive: Hunter's Instinct
Additional Ability: Business Partner
Desc: When Pulchra activates an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, she enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Hunter's Gait</color> state, increasing the Daze she deals by <color=#2BAD00>15%</color> for 6s. After switching to another character, if Pulchra is still in the <color=#FFFFFF>Hunter's Gait</color> state, the state will last until Pulchra switches back in. While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Hunter's Gait</color> state and as the active character, when Pulchra lands a heavy attack on enemies, she can trigger a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> from the previous character in the squad.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color> character or shares the same Faction:
When Pulchra hits enemies with <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Rending Claw - Nightmare Shadow</color>, an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, it applies the <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Trap</color> effect for 15s. After applying <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Trap</color>, all units' <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> DMG against the target is increased by 30%.

After applying <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Trap</color>, all units' <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> DMG against the target is increased by 30%.

1.Name: Self-Interest
1.Desc: When dealing DMG to enemies affected by <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Trap</color>, increase own CRIT Rate by 10%.

2.Name: Opportunistic
2.Desc: While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Hunter's Gait</color> state from <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Hunter's Instinct</color>, Pulchra's ATK is increased by an additional 10%.

4.Name: Joy of the Hunt
4.Desc: Reduces Energy Cost of activating <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Rending Claw - Flashstep</color> by 5.

6.Name: Behind the Mask
6.Desc: <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Rending Claw - Nightmare Shadow's</color> DMG is increased by 15%, and the number of times the repeated attack can trigger is increased by 2. <color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability: Business Partner</color>'s <color=#FFFFFF>Binding Trap</color> effect now also applies to all damage types, not just <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> DMG.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Cold-Bore Shot
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 shots ahead. The first 3 hits deal <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>, the 4th hit deals <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Silenced Shot
Description.Desc:
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Trigger enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Sniper Stance</color> and fires forward continuously, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
While continually firing, when attacked by an enemy, Trigger will automatically evade. This effect can trigger once every 8s.
While continually firing, you can drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to adjust her position to the left/right/back.
Automatically evading attacks or adjusting position when about to be hit will trigger a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color>, followed by an automatic charged counter.
After releasing <IconMap:Icon_Normal>, Trigger will step back, ready her weapon and unleash a Finishing Move, then exit <color=#FFFFFF>Sniper Stance</color>.
Character is invulnerable during the charged counter and Finishing Move.
When the continuous firing or the charged counter hits an enemy, Trigger gains 25 <color=#FFFFFF>Purge</color>, up to a maximum of 100 <color=#FFFFFF>Purge</color>.
When the Finishing Move hits an enemy, it triggers the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> of the previous character in the squad.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Harmonizing Shot
Description.Desc:
When Trigger has <color=#FFFFFF>Purge</color>, use another active character in the squad to hit an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> to activate:
While encircling the enemy, rapidly fire two shots at the enemy, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Upon activating this skill, consume 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Purge</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Harmonizing Shot</color> is an <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> attack.
The squad can trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Harmonizing Shot</color> once every 3s.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Harmonizing Shot - Tartarus
Description.Desc:
When Trigger has <color=#FFFFFF>Purge</color>, use another active character in the squad to hit an enemy with a heavy attack from an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> to activate:
While encircling the enemy, rapidly fires three shots at the enemy, followed by a Finishing Move, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Upon activating this skill, consume 5 <color=#FFFFFF>Purge</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Harmonizing Shot - Tartarus</color> is an <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> attack.
The same skill type can trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Harmonizing Shot - Tartarus</color> up to 2 times within 20s for the entire squad.

Description.Name: Dodge: Phantom Concealment
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Vengeful Specter
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Rapidly lift the gun and fire, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Condemned Soul
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Rotate and fire a quick shot at enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Spectral Flash
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Lunge forward with a slash, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Flash Burial
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Lunge forward with a slash, then leap up with a powerful shot to the ground, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
When this skill hits an enemy, it triggers the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> of the previous character in the squad
When this skill hits an enemy, Trigger enters <color=#FFFFFF>Coordinated Support</color>. While in this state, when another active character in the squad hits an enemy with any attack, it triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Harmonizing Shot</color> without consuming <color=#FFFFFF>Purge</color> and with no cooldown restrictions. This state lasts 8s and the effect can trigger up to 4 times. Each repeated trigger extends the duration and grants additional triggers, lasting a maximum of 20s and triggering up to a maximum of 10 times.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Stygian Guide
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes continuous powerful shots forward, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Underworld Requiem
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Deliver a powerful shot at enemies in a large area ahead, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
When the skill hits an enemy, it triggers the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> of the previous character in the squad.
When the skill hits an enemy, Trigger enters <color=#FFFFFF>Coordinated Support</color>. While in this state, when another active character in the squad hits an enemy with any attack, it triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Harmonizing Shot</color> without consuming <color=#FFFFFF>Purge</color> and with no cooldown restrictions. This state lasts 12s and the effect can trigger up to 6 times. Each repeated trigger extends the duration and grants additional triggers, lasting a maximum of 20s and triggering up to a maximum of 10 times.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Cold-Bore Cover Fire
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Rotate and fire a quick shot at enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Delaying Demise
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Piercing Thunder
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Unleash a series of slashes at enemies ahead, followed by a powerful charged shot after landing, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1.Name: Sharpened Senses

When activating <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Harmonizing Shot</color>, the cooldown is reduced to 2s. <color=#FFFFFF>Purge</color> gained upon hitting an enemy with the continuous fire or charged counter in <color=#FFFFFF>Sniper Stance</color> increases by 25%. Maximum <color=#FFFFFF>Purge</color> increases to 125.

2.Name: "Ether Vision"
2.Desc: Upon using an <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color>, Trigger gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Hunter's Gaze</color>. When executing a Finishing Move in <color=#FFFFFF>Sniper Stance</color>, Trigger gains 2 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Hunter's Gaze</color>. Each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Hunter's Gaze</color> increases all squad members' CRIT DMG by 6%, stacking up to 4 times, and lasting 10s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

4.Name: Concealment
4.Desc: When Trigger enters or extends <color=#FFFFFF>Coordinated Support</color>, while the state is active, the next time other squad members trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Harmonizing Shot</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Harmonizing Shot - Tartarus</color>, it will trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Disconnect</color> upon hitting an enemy, dealing additional DMG equal to 200% of Trigger's ATK and inflict Daze equal to 120% of Trigger's Impact. This skill has a relatively high Interrupt Level.

6.Name: Beyond the River of the Dead
6.Desc: Upon entering the battlefield, Trigger gains 5 <color=#FFFFFF>Armor Break Rounds</color>. For every 25 <color=#FFFFFF>Purge</color> consumed, Trigger gains 1 additional <color=#FFFFFF>Armor Break Round</color>, up to a maximum of 5 rounds. While possessing <color=#FFFFFF>Armor Break Rounds</color>, when Trigger hits a target in <color=#FFFFFF>Sniper Stance</color>, 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Armor Break Round</color> is consumed to deal additional <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> equal to 1,200% of Trigger's ATK. In addition, this instance of DMG is additionally increased by 50%. This effect can trigger once every 0.2s.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Penetrating Shock
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Perform up to five slashes ahead, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>. After the 4th attack hits the enemy, repeatedly press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to quickly pass through enemies in front up to 5 times.

Description.Name: Dodge: Strobe
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Torrent
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Perform a horizontal slash forward, then follow up with a thrust attack, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Ground Flash Counter
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Repeatedly slash enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Celestial Thunder
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Dash diagonally forward, then unleash a cross slash, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Azure Flash
Description.Desc:
When Soldier 0 - Anby's attacks hit an enemy, they apply the <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color> mark and charges the target 
For every one-third of charge, the enemy receives 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>White Thunder</color>, stacking up to 3 times.
When the enemy has <color=#FFFFFF>White Thunder</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Quickly dash forward, slashing through enemies and dealing multiple hits of <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the skill hits an enemy, it will consume 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>White Thunder</color> to trigger an <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> that deals 1 extra instance of <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Thunder Smite
Description.Desc:
When the additional damage from <color=#FFFFFF>White Thunder</color> triggers 3 times on the same enemy:
A lightning strike will fall at the enemy's location, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> to enemies within range.
This DMG is considered <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> DMG.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Sundering Bolt
Description.Desc:
With enough energy, hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Combines her twin swords and throws them forward for a high-speed slash, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the skill hits an enemy, it will fully charge <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Leaping Thunderstrike
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Leap forward, then quickly dive and perform a cross slash, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:

When the skill hits an enemy, it will fully charge <color=#FFFFFF>Silver Star</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1.Name: Static Charge
1.Desc: When Soldier 0 - Anby uses an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> to hit an enemy, it triggers the additional DMG from <color=#FFFFFF>White Thunder</color> 3 times. This effect does not consume any <color=#FFFFFF>White Thunder</color> stacks.

2.Name: Fail-Safe Protocol
2.Desc: Soldier 0 - Anby's CRIT Rate increases by 12%. When she uses her <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, she gains 6 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Thunder's Cry</color> (max 6 stacks). With <color=#FFFFFF>Thunder's Cry</color>, when using <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Azure Flash</color> to hit an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>White Thunder</color>, it will consume 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Thunder's Cry</color> instead. 4.Name: Silver Reverb

6.Name: Prequel Protagonist
6.Desc: Upon triggering 6 instances of <color=#FFFFFF>White Thunder</color>'s additional DMG, an electromagnetic vortex will be generated, dealing 1,000% of Soldier 0 - Anby's ATK as <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>. This DMG is considered <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> DMG.

LunarPleniluna.name: [Lunar] Pleniluna
LunarPleniluna.desc: A W-Engine that prioritizes damage output over noise reduction. It can indiscriminately deal considerable damage to all units nearby. Its designer compares it to the full moon. Bright moonlight can interrupt people's sleep, and nothing can be done about it. But the moonlight does not bother anyone on purpose — you just have to get used to it.
LunarPleniluna.desc2: Equip to increase Attack Agents' combat capabilities
LunarPleniluna.desc3: A W-Engine that prioritizes damage output over noise reduction. It can indiscriminately deal considerable damage to all units nearby.

LunarDecrescent.desc: A W-Engine with excellent sonic and thermal energy usage, capable of hitting its target with a double whammy. Those hit, be it intentionally or not, have a chance to be diagnosed with snow blindness. The exact cause remains unknown, so obtaining insurance compensation after falling victim to this malady is close to impossible. There was a poor Hollow investigator who learned it the hard way.
LunarDecrescent.desc2: Equip to increase Attack Agents' combat capabilities
LunarDecrescent.desc3: A W-Engine with excellent sonic and thermal energy usage, capable of hitting its target with a double whammy.

LunarNoviluna.name: [Lunar] Noviluna
LunarNoviluna.desc: This high-capacity portable W-Engine can collect dissipated energy from its surroundings, thus enhancing the combat effectiveness of its operator. It is a perfect choice for novice explorers who are worried that their W-Engine may run out of power during expeditions.
LunarNoviluna.desc2: Equip to increase Attack Agents' combat capabilities
LunarNoviluna.desc3: A high-capacity portable W-Engine that can collect dissipated energy from its surroundings, thus enhancing the combat effectiveness of its operator.

ReverbMarkI.name: [Reverb] Mark I
ReverbMarkI.desc: This special W-Engine features a built-in sonic generator that converts collected energy into penetrating infrasound waves, thereby boosting its damage output. However, to activate this function, the operator needs to charge up enough power, and the first step of charging up is to use up any remaining energy in the W-Engine.
ReverbMarkI.desc2: Equip to increase Support Agents' combat capabilities
ReverbMarkI.desc3: A special W-Engine featuring a built-in sonic generator that boosts its damage output.

ReverbMarkII.desc: A standardized W-Engine with balanced performance. Despite lacking any particular tendencies, it enhances its owner's and it's owner's teammates' combat effectiveness in all aspects. For novice explorers who have not figured out their preferred combat style, this W-Engine is an excellent choice.
ReverbMarkII.desc2: Equip to increase Support Agents' combat capabilities
ReverbMarkII.desc3: A standardized W-Engine with balanced performance that enhances its owner's and their teammates' combat effectiveness in all aspects.

ReverbMarkIII.name: [Reverb] Mark III
ReverbMarkIII.desc: This special W-Engine features motion capture algorithms that monitor the status of the operator's teammates, enabling it to send signals to coordinate tactical movements and enhance the overall combat competency of the squad. However, this premise assumes that everyone can keep up with its signals instead of stepping on other members' toes...
ReverbMarkIII.desc2: Equip to increase Support Agents' combat capabilities
ReverbMarkIII.desc3: A special W-Engine that features motion capture algorithms, which enhance the overall combat competency of your squad.

VortexRevolver.name: [Vortex] Revolver
VortexRevolver.desc: An energy-storage type W-Engine with a unique operation circuit. It will absorb scattered energy up to a certain amount before unleashing it, dealing some extra impact. It's impossible to control when that energy is unleashed, but when it is, it'll give you the joy of winning a prize draw.
VortexRevolver.desc2: Equip to increase Stun Agents' combat capabilities
VortexRevolver.desc3: An energy-storage type W-Engine with a unique operation circuit. It will absorb scattered energy up to a certain amount before unleashing it all at once.

VortexArrow.name: [Vortex] Arrow
VortexArrow.desc: A tactical W-Engine that locates enemies using high-frequency sound waves. Once it has marked its targets, it will activate its aiming aid to make the operator's precision attack more deadly. While this feature increases the operator's efficiency in battles, it may occasionally attract curious Ethereals from afar.
VortexArrow.desc2: Equip to increase Stun Agents' combat capabilities
VortexArrow.desc3: A tactical W-Engine that locates enemies using high-frequency sound waves. Its aiming aid can make its operator's precision attack more deadly.

VortexHatchet.name: [Vortex] Hatchet
VortexHatchet.desc: This inverter W-Engine can generate excessive power and effectively increase its operator's battle prowess. However, due to its poor heat dissipation, it emits ear-splitting noise during battle. As a result, all squad members will need to wear earplugs.
VortexHatchet.desc2: Equip to increase Stun Agents' combat capabilities
VortexHatchet.desc3: A frequency-converting W-Engine that can quickly generate excessive power and effectively increase its user's battle prowess.

MagneticStormAlpha.name: [Magnetic Storm] Alpha
MagneticStormAlpha.desc: This special W-Engine can analyze the target's weak spots through real-time calculations. Although its heavy exoskeleton can be a burden to the operator, some users have found it to be an efficient way to exercise and lose weight, and have thus become loyal customers.
MagneticStormAlpha.desc2: Equip to increase Anomaly Agents' combat capabilities
MagneticStormAlpha.desc3: A special W-Engine that can analyze the target's weak spots through real-time calculations.

MagneticStormBravo.desc: This damage-type W-Engine features enhanced movement detection modules that can detect the operator's status in real-time and boost their combat prowess at critical moments to optimize battle efficiency. After the operator completes the finishing move, the W-Engine emits a dazzling multicolored flash and rates the operator's move.
MagneticStormBravo.desc2: Equip to increase Anomaly Agents' combat capabilities
MagneticStormBravo.desc3: A damage-type W-Engine that features an enhanced movement detection module that can quickly alter its output intensity to optimize battle efficiency.

MagneticStormCharlie.name: [Magnetic Storm] Charlie
MagneticStormCharlie.desc: A high-capacity W-Engine that features a built-in generator, allowing it to keep a stable storage of electrical power without any manual operation from the operator. As a result, it proves to be exceptionally used in battle as its electric current can stun tough enemies.
MagneticStormCharlie.desc2: Equip to increase Anomaly Agents' combat capabilities
MagneticStormCharlie.desc3: A high-capacity W-Engine that features a built-in generator, which allows it to keep a stable storage of electrical power.

IdentityBase.desc: A W-Engine with a component structure adjusted according to specific parameters. It can enhance the defensive capabilities of those who have a certain style of combat. If the user does not meet the requirements for this W-Engine, then carrying it would be like lugging around an over-sized shield in battle.

IdentityBase.desc3: A W-Engine with a component structure adjusted according to specific parameters. It can enhance the defensive capabilities of those who have a certain style of combat.

IdentityInflection.name: [Identity] Inflection
IdentityInflection.desc: A functional W-Engine that specializes in energy conversion. It can analyze combat environments and generate special sounds to disrupt the enemy's attack. However, when facing a strong-willed enemy, you will still need to seize the right opportunity to attack. Luckily, most Ethereals lack the willpower to resist it.
IdentityInflection.desc2: Equip to increase Defense Agents' combat capabilities
IdentityInflection.desc3: A functional W-Engine that specializes in energy conversion. It can analyze combat environments and generate special sounds to disrupt the enemy's offense.

StreetSuperstar.name: Street Superstar
StreetSuperstar.desc:
A custom-made W-Engine designed for street music lovers. It sacrifices cooling components to make space for high-end speaker modules, ensuring your fans, both Ethereal and human, hear your every word.
——From the streets to the Hollows, superstars are never short of flowers and applause. The bars they spit are so flaming hot, they add the perfect heat to any battlefield.
StreetSuperstar.desc2: Equip to increase Attack Agents' combat capabilities
StreetSuperstar.desc3: A custom-made W-Engine designed for urban music lovers. It sacrifices heat dissipation components for improved sound quality.

phase.name: Flaming Bars

SliceOfTime.name: Slice of Time
SliceOfTime.desc:
A special W-Engine equipped with a high-speed camera module. The best choice for in-Hollow photography enthusiasts. It captures every touching moment spent beating up your Ethereal friends, as long as you have a free hand to press the shutter.
P.S. The internal optical components have not undergone anti-corruption treatment. Please do not lose the warranty form.
SliceOfTime.desc2: Equip to increase Support Agents' combat capabilities
SliceOfTime.desc3: A special W-Engine equipped with a high-speed camera module. The best choice for in-Hollow photography enthusiasts.

RainforestGourmet.name: Rainforest Gourmet
RainforestGourmet.desc: A consumer-class W-Engine launched by an exotic pet fan club to promote pet culture. It used to be a popular model until three customers' fingers, a staff member, and half a Bangboo disappeared into a Gourmet's big mouth. Ether blocks generated by the mouth module can rapidly devour substances. Please avoid putting your head and limbs inside.
RainforestGourmet.desc2: Equip to increase Anomaly Agents' combat capabilities
RainforestGourmet.desc3: A consumer-class W-Engine launched by an exotic pet fan club to promote pet culture. Due to its cute appearance, it was once a very popular model.

StarlightEngine.name: Starlight Engine
StarlightEngine.desc: A damage-type W-Engine made of special Etheric matter. When its operator is attacked, it builds up energy and boosts its damage output. Although it does not grant the operator the power to transform into a Starlight Knight, it provides a surge of courage when the operator is in dire situations.
StarlightEngine.desc2: Equip to increase Attack Agents' combat capabilities
StarlightEngine.desc3: A damage-type W-Engine made of special Etheric matter. When its user is attacked, it builds up energy.

phase.desc: Launching a <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> increases the equipper's ATK by <color=#2BAD00>12%</color> for 12s.

phase.desc: Launching a <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> increases the equipper's ATK by <color=#2BAD00>13.8%</color> for 12s.

SteamOven.name: Steam Oven
SteamOven.desc: This high-power W-Engine boasts a cutting-edge energy conversion device that collects heat from its surroundings and supplies it to the steamer, making it easy for the operator to cook or heat up objects. This makes it a perfect choice for Hollow explorers. However... please be careful when using it to avoid burns.
SteamOven.desc2: Equip to increase Stun Agents' combat capabilities
SteamOven.desc3: A high-power W-Engine that boasts a cutting-edge energy conversion system. It collects excess heat and supplies it to the steamer.

phase.name: Thick Broth
phase.desc: For every 10 Energy accumulated, the equipper's Impact is increased by <color=#2BAD00>2%</color>, stacking up to 8 times. After Energy is consumed, this bonus remains for 8 more seconds. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

phase.name: Thick Broth
phase.desc: For every 10 Energy accumulated, the equipper's Impact is increased by <color=#2BAD00>2.3%</color>, stacking up to 8 times. After Energy is consumed, this bonus remains for 8 more seconds. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

phase.name: Thick Broth
phase.desc: For every 10 Energy accumulated, the equipper's Impact is increased by <color=#2BAD00>2.6%</color>, stacking up to 8 times. After Energy is consumed, this bonus remains for 8 more seconds. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

phase.name: Thick Broth
phase.desc: For every 10 Energy accumulated, the equipper's Impact is increased by <color=#2BAD00>2.9%</color>, stacking up to 8 times. After Energy is consumed, this bonus remains for 8 more seconds. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

phase.name: Thick Broth
phase.desc: For every 10 Energy accumulated, the equipper's Impact is increased by <color=#2BAD00>3.2%</color>, stacking up to 8 times. After Energy is consumed, this bonus remains for 8 more seconds. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

PreciousFossilizedCore.name: Precious Fossilized Core
PreciousFossilizedCore.desc: A special W-Engine whose outer shell is made of composite Etheric matter that effectively absorb incoming impacts in combat and turn it against the enemy. Rumors suggest that its prototype was crafted by a legendary Hollow explorer, and despite its ancient appearance, it continues to run smoothly. This W-Engine is literally an "old timer" in the field of W-Engines.
PreciousFossilizedCore.desc2: Equip to increase Stun Agents' combat capabilities
PreciousFossilizedCore.desc3: A special W-Engine whose outer shell is made of composite Etheric matter that effectively absorbs impact, and turns it against the enemy.

phase.name: Behemoth Hunter
phase.desc: When the target's HP is no lower than 50%, the equipper inflicts <color=#2BAD00>10%</color> more Daze to the target. When the target's HP is no lower than 75%, this bonus is further increased by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color>.

phase.name: Behemoth Hunter
phase.desc: When the target's HP is no lower than 50%, the equipper inflicts <color=#2BAD00>11.5%</color> more Daze to the target. When the target's HP is no lower than 75%, this bonus is further increased by <color=#2BAD00>11.5%</color>.

phase.name: Behemoth Hunter
phase.desc: When the target's HP is no lower than 50%, the equipper inflicts <color=#2BAD00>13%</color> more Daze to the target. When the target's HP is no lower than 75%, this bonus is further increased by <color=#2BAD00>13%</color>.

phase.name: Behemoth Hunter
phase.desc: When the target's HP is no lower than 50%, the equipper inflicts <color=#2BAD00>14.5%</color> more Daze to the target. When the target's HP is no lower than 75%, this bonus is further increased by <color=#2BAD00>14.5%</color>.

phase.name: Behemoth Hunter
phase.desc: When the target's HP is no lower than 50%, the equipper inflicts <color=#2BAD00>16%</color> more Daze to the target. When the target's HP is no lower than 75%, this bonus is further increased by <color=#2BAD00>16%</color>.

OriginalTransmorpher.name: Original Transmorpher
OriginalTransmorpher.desc:
A dream W-Engine adored by Starlight Knights fans. Its copyright owner claims that counterfeit transformers can transform you into a bad guy NPC. Watch out for a flying kick that'll scare the bejesus out of the bad guys — that's the power of genuine copyrighted merch!
"Starlight Knights, transform— Transform! Transform! Why can't I transform? Unless... the stars haven't chosen me?!" — from an unboxing vlog recorded by an anonymous member of the Cunning Hares.
OriginalTransmorpher.desc2: Equip to increase Defense Agents' combat capabilities
OriginalTransmorpher.desc3: An epic W-Engine favored by Starlight Knight fans. Its high popularity and scarcity marketing strategy have caused an influx of knock-offs.

phase.name: Starlight Knight Flying Kick
phase.desc: Increases Max HP by <color=#2BAD00>8%</color>. When attacked, the equipper's Impact is increased by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color> for 12s.

phase.name: Starlight Knight Flying Kick
phase.desc: Increases Max HP by <color=#2BAD00>9%</color>. When attacked, the equipper's Impact is increased by <color=#2BAD00>11.5%</color> for 12s.

phase.desc: Increases Max HP by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color>. When attacked, the equipper's Impact is increased by <color=#2BAD00>13%</color> for 12s.

phase.name: Starlight Knight Flying Kick
phase.desc: Increases Max HP by <color=#2BAD00>11%</color>. When attacked, the equipper's Impact is increased by <color=#2BAD00>14.5%</color> for 12s.

phase.name: Starlight Knight Flying Kick
phase.desc: Increases Max HP by <color=#2BAD00>12.5%</color>. When attacked, the equipper's Impact is increased by <color=#2BAD00>16%</color> for 12s.

WeepingGemini.name: Weeping Gemini
WeepingGemini.desc: A W-Engine produced by recycling abandoned Bangboo shells. Though it's made from scrapped parts, it still caused some distress among Bangboo lovers. "No Bangboo were hurt during the production of this W-Engine." — the manufacturer had to include this note on the packaging due to protests from Bangboo rights organizations.
WeepingGemini.desc2: Equip to increase Anomaly Agents' combat capabilities
WeepingGemini.desc3: A W-Engine produced by recycling abandoned Bangboo shells. Its electrode cores made of recycled metals can release high-voltage charges.

phase.name: Lingering Cries
phase.desc: Whenever a squad member inflicts an Attribute Anomaly on an enemy, the equipper gains a buff that increases Anomaly Proficiency by <color=#2BAD00>30</color>, stacking up to 4 times. This effect expires when the target recovers from Stun or is defeated. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

phase.desc: Whenever a squad member inflicts an Attribute Anomaly on an enemy, the equipper gains a buff that increases Anomaly Proficiency by <color=#2BAD00>34</color>, stacking up to 4 times. This effect expires when the target recovers from Stun or is defeated. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

ElectroLipGloss.name: Electro-Lip Gloss
ElectroLipGloss.desc: This damage-type W-Engine boasts a built-in current transformer, with its discharge part designed as a protruding lip gloss. It automatically attracts electrically sensitive objects around the operator and deals additional damage to them. Such is not the power of love, but rather the Lorentz force generated by a 1,000-volt electric field.
ElectroLipGloss.desc2: Equip to increase Anomaly Agents' combat capabilities
ElectroLipGloss.desc3: This damage-type W-Engine boasts a built-in current transformer, and automatically attracts electrically sensitive objects around the operator and deals additional damage to them.

phase.name: Kiss of Death
phase.desc: When there are enemies inflicted with Attribute Anomaly on the field, the equipper's ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color> and they deal an additional <color=#2BAD00>15%</color> more DMG to the target.

phase.name: Kiss of Death
phase.desc: When there are enemies inflicted with Attribute Anomaly on the field, the equipper's ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>11.5%</color> and they deal an additional <color=#2BAD00>17.5%</color> more DMG to the target.

phase.name: Kiss of Death
phase.desc: When there are enemies inflicted with Attribute Anomaly on the field, the equipper's ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>13%</color> and they deal an additional <color=#2BAD00>20%</color> more DMG to the target.

phase.name: Kiss of Death
phase.desc: When there are enemies inflicted with Attribute Anomaly on the field, the equipper's ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>14.5%</color> and they deal an additional <color=#2BAD00>22.5%</color> more DMG to the target.

phase.name: Kiss of Death
phase.desc: When there are enemies inflicted with Attribute Anomaly on the field, the equipper's ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>16%</color> and they deal an additional <color=#2BAD00>25%</color> more DMG to the target.

BunnyBand.name: Bunny Band
BunnyBand.desc: A special W-Engine decorated with a fluffy bunny. Although it is a mere imitation of the real animal, even the fiercest of Hollow Raiders can relieve stress by petting their bunnies while taking a break, which enhances their combat performance. There are many similar models in this series of W-Engines: a portable bunny, a foldable bunny, a furless bunny... Everyone can find one they will not be able to refuse.
BunnyBand.desc2: Equip to increase Defense Agents' combat capabilities
BunnyBand.desc3: A special W-Engine decorated with a fluffy bunny. However, it is just an imitation of the real animal.

phase.name: Pet the Bunny
phase.desc: Increases Max HP by <color=#2BAD00>8%</color>. Increases the equipper's ATK by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color> when they are shielded.

phase.name: Pet the Bunny
phase.desc: Increases Max HP by <color=#2BAD00>9.2%</color>. Increases the equipper's ATK by <color=#2BAD00>11.5%</color> when they are shielded.

phase.name: Pet the Bunny
phase.desc: Increases Max HP by <color=#2BAD00>10.4%</color>. Increases the equipper's ATK by <color=#2BAD00>13%</color> when they are shielded.

phase.name: Pet the Bunny
phase.desc: Increases Max HP by <color=#2BAD00>11.6%</color>. Increases the equipper's ATK by <color=#2BAD00>14.5%</color> when they are shielded.

phase.name: Pet the Bunny
phase.desc: Increases Max HP by <color=#2BAD00>12.8%</color>. Increases the equipper's ATK by <color=#2BAD00>16%</color> when they are shielded.

SpringEmbrace.name: Spring Embrace
SpringEmbrace.desc: A special W-Engine equipped with a temperature regulator where residual heat generated by the W-Engine's high frequency is funneled into the hot springs on its surface. The owner of this W-Engine can drink hot spring soup with all its spring warmth in front of frost-covered enemies. Of course, some people think it's like drinking bath water.
SpringEmbrace.desc2: Equip to increase Defense Agents' combat capabilities
SpringEmbrace.desc3: A special W-Engine equipped with a temperature regulator where residual heat generated by the W-Engine's high frequency is funneled into the hot springs on its surface.

phase.name: Hot Spring Soup
phase.desc: Reduces DMG taken by <color=#2BAD00>7.5%</color>. When attacked, the equipper's Energy Generation Rate increases by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color> for 12s. When the equipper switches off-field, this buff will be transferred to the new on-field character with its duration refreshed. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

phase.desc: Reduces DMG taken by <color=#2BAD00>8.5%</color>. When attacked, the equipper's Energy Generation Rate increases by <color=#2BAD00>11.5%</color> for 12s. When the equipper switches off-field, this buff will be transferred to the new on-field character with its duration refreshed. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

When the equipper switches off-field, this buff will be transferred to the new on-field character with its duration refreshed. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

GildedBlossom.name: Gilded Blossom
GildedBlossom.desc: A W-Engine that represents the brilliance and magnificence of flowers, seemingly crafted from the most luxurious materials. However, after finally dismantling the Ether-powered premium anti-theft device, an experienced thief will discover with terror that this W-Engine... is only gold plated.
GildedBlossom.desc2: Equip to increase Attack Agents' combat capabilities
GildedBlossom.desc3: A W-Engine with a grandiose and luxurious appearance equipped with a premium Ether-powered anti-theft device. It's actually used to provide the equipper with energy.

phase.name: Extraordinary Anti-Theft Measures
phase.desc: ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>6</color>%, and DMG dealt by <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attacks</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>15%</color>.

phase.name: Extraordinary Anti-Theft Measures
phase.desc: ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>6.9</color>%, and DMG dealt by <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attacks</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>17.2%</color>.

phase.desc: ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>7.8</color>%, and DMG dealt by <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attacks</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>19.5%</color>.

phase.desc: ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>8.7</color>%, and DMG dealt by <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attacks</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>21.8%</color>.
